## 5. **Multi-Provider LLM Integration Pattern** üß†

**Features:**
- **Provider Fallback**: Anthropic primary, OpenAI fallback
- **Rate Limit Handling**: Exponential backoff retry with intelligent switching
- **Response Parsing**: Flexible JSON and text extraction
- **Error Recovery**: Graceful degradation to rule-based analysis

**Implementation:**
```typescript
private async callAnthropicWithRetry(prompt: string, maxRetries: number = 3): Promise<string> {
  for (let attempt = 0; attempt < maxRetries; attempt++) {
    try {
      const result = await this.anthropicClient!.messages.create({
        model: "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022",
        max_tokens: 2000,
        messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }]
      });
      return result.content[0].type === 'text' ? result.content[0].text : '';
    } catch (error: any) {
      if (this.isRateLimitError(error)) {
        const backoffMs = Math.min(1000 * Math.pow(2, attempt), 30000);
        await this.sleep(backoffMs);
        continue;
      }
      break;
    }
  }
}
```

## 6. **Semantic Code Analysis Pattern** üîç

**Analysis Layers:**
- **Static Analysis**: Complexity calculation, pattern detection, function extraction
- **Cross-Analysis Correlation**: Links git changes to code patterns and conversation themes
- **Language-Agnostic Processing**: Supports TypeScript, Python, Java, Rust, etc.
- **Pattern Recognition**: Detects architectural patterns (singleton, factory, observer, etc.)

**Implementation:**
```typescript
private detectCodePatterns(content: string, language: string): string[] {
  const patterns: string[] = [];
  const patternMatches = [
    { pattern: 'singleton', regex: /class\s+\w+\s*{[\s\S]*?private\s+static\s+instance/i },
    { pattern: 'factory', regex: /create\w*\s*\([^)]*\)[\s\S]*?return\s+new/i },
    { pattern: 'observer', regex: /(addEventListener|subscribe|notify|Observer)/i },
    // ... more patterns
  ];
  
  for (const { pattern, regex } of patternMatches) {
    if (regex.test(content)) {
      patterns.push(pattern);
    }
  }
  return patterns;
}
```

```typescript
export function log(message: string, level: LogLevel = "info", data?: any): void {
  const entry: LogEntry = {
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
    level,
    message,
    data
  };
  
  console.error(`[${entry.timestamp}] ${level.toUpperCase()}: ${message}`);
  if (logFile) {
    fs.appendFileSync(logFile, JSON.stringify(entry) + '\n');
  }
}
```

     2‚Üíimport {
     3‚Üí  CallToolRequestSchema,
     4‚Üí  ListToolsRequestSchema,
     5‚Üí} from "@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/types.js";
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíimport { log, logRequest, logResponse, logError } from "./logging.js";
     8‚Üíimport { TOOLS, handleToolCall } from "./tools.js";
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üíexport function createServer() {
    11‚Üí  const server = new Server(
    12‚Üí    {
    13‚Üí      name: "semantic-analysis",
    14‚Üí      version: "1.0.0",
    15‚Üí    },
    16‚Üí    {
    17‚Üí      capabilities: {
    18‚Üí        tools: {},
    19‚Üí        logging: {},
    20‚Üí      },
    21‚Üí    }
    22‚Üí  );
    23‚Üí
    24‚Üí  // Setup request handlers
    25‚Üí  server.setRequestHandler(ListToolsRequestSchema, async (request) => {
    26‚Üí    try {
    27‚Üí      logRequest("ListTools", request.params);
    28‚Üí      const response = { tools: TOOLS };
    29‚Üí      logResponse("ListTools", response);
    30‚Üí      return response;
    31‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    32‚Üí      logError(error instanceof Error ? error : new Error(String(error)), "ListTools");
    33‚Üí      return {
    34‚Üí        error: {
    35‚Üí          code: -32603,
    36‚Üí          message: `Internal error: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}`,
    37‚Üí        },
    38‚Üí      };
    39‚Üí    }
    40‚Üí  });
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üí  server.setRequestHandler(CallToolRequestSchema, async (request) => {
    43‚Üí    try {
    44‚Üí      logRequest("CallTool", request.params);
    45‚Üí
    46‚Üí      if (!request.params?.name || !TOOLS.find((t) => t.name === request.params.name)) {
    47‚Üí        throw new Error(`Invalid tool name: ${request.params?.name}`);
    48‚Üí      }
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí      const result = await handleToolCall(
    51‚Üí        request.params.name,
    52‚Üí        request.params.arguments ?? {}
    53‚Üí      );
    54‚Üí
    55‚Üí      logResponse("CallTool", result);
    56‚Üí      return result;
    57‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    58‚Üí      logError(error instanceof Error ? error : new Error(String(error)), "CallTool");
    59‚Üí      return {
    60‚Üí        error: {
    61‚Üí          code: -32603,
    62‚Üí          message: `Internal error: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}`,
    63‚Üí        },
    64‚Üí      };
    65‚Üí    }
    66‚Üí  });
    67‚Üí
    68‚Üí  return server;
    69‚Üí}

   270‚Üí// Tool call handler
   271‚Üíexport async function handleToolCall(name: string, args: any): Promise<any> {
   272‚Üí  log(`Handling tool call: ${name}`, "info", args);
   273‚Üí
   274‚Üí  try {
   275‚Üí    switch (name) {
   276‚Üí      case "heartbeat":
   277‚Üí        return handleHeartbeat();
   278‚Üí        
   279‚Üí      case "test_connection":
   280‚Üí        return handleTestConnection();
   281‚Üí        
   282‚Üí      case "determine_insights":
   283‚Üí        return await handleDetermineInsights(args);
   284‚Üí        
   285‚Üí      case "analyze_code":
   286‚Üí        return await handleAnalyzeCode(args);
   287‚Üí        
   288‚Üí      case "analyze_repository":
   289‚Üí        return await handleAnalyzeRepository(args);
   290‚Üí        
   291‚Üí      case "extract_patterns":
   292‚Üí        return await handleExtractPatterns(args);
   293‚Üí        
   294‚Üí      case "create_ukb_entity_with_insight":
   295‚Üí        return await handleCreateUkbEntity(args);
   296‚Üí        
   297‚Üí      case "execute_workflow":
   298‚Üí        return await handleExecuteWorkflow(args);
   299‚Üí        
   300‚Üí      case "generate_documentation":
   301‚Üí        return await handleGenerateDocumentation(args);
   302‚Üí        
   303‚Üí      case "create_insight_report":
   304‚Üí        return await handleCreateInsightReport(args);
   305‚Üí        
   306‚Üí      case "generate_plantuml_diagrams":
   307‚Üí        return await handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams(args);
   308‚Üí        
   309‚Üí        
   310‚Üí      default:
   311‚Üí        throw new Error(`Unknown tool: ${name}`);
   312‚Üí    }
   313‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   314‚Üí    log(`Error in tool ${name}:`, "error", error);
   315‚Üí    return {
   316‚Üí      content: [
   317‚Üí        {
   318‚Üí          type: "text",
   319‚Üí          text: `Error: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}`,
   320‚Üí        },
   321‚Üí      ],
   322‚Üí      isError: true,
   323‚Üí    };
   324‚Üí  }
   325‚Üí}

   361‚Üíasync function handleDetermineInsights(args: any): Promise<any> {
   362‚Üí  const { content, context, analysis_type = "general", provider = "auto" } = args;
   363‚Üí  
   364‚Üí  log(`Determining insights for content (${content.length} chars)`, "info", {
   365‚Üí    analysis_type,
   366‚Üí    provider,
   367‚Üí    has_context: !!context,
   368‚Üí  });
   369‚Üí  
   370‚Üí  try {
   371‚Üí    const analyzer = new SemanticAnalyzer();
   372‚Üí    log("SemanticAnalyzer created", "info");
   373‚Üí    
   374‚Üí    const result = await analyzer.analyzeContent(content, {
   375‚Üí      context,
   376‚Üí      analysisType: analysis_type,
   377‚Üí      provider
   378‚Üí    });
   379‚Üí    
   380‚Üí    log("SemanticAnalyzer.analyzeContent completed", "info", {
   381‚Üí      hasResult: !!result,
   382‚Üí      resultType: typeof result,
   383‚Üí      resultKeys: result ? Object.keys(result) : null,
   384‚Üí      insightsLength: result?.insights?.length || 0,
   385‚Üí      provider: result?.provider || "none"
   386‚Üí    });
   387‚Üí
   388‚Üí    if (!result) {
   389‚Üí      throw new Error("SemanticAnalyzer returned null/undefined result");
   390‚Üí    }
   391‚Üí
   392‚Üí    return {
   393‚Üí      content: [
   394‚Üí        {
   395‚Üí          type: "text", 
   396‚Üí          text: `# Semantic Analysis Insights\n\n${result.insights || 'No insights generated'}\n\n## Metadata\n- Provider: ${result.provider || 'Unknown'}\n- Analysis Type: ${analysis_type}\n- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}`,
   397‚Üí        },
   398‚Üí      ],
   399‚Üí    };
   400‚Üí  } catch (error: any) {

   403‚Üí      stack: error.stack

   406‚Üí    return {

   409‚Üí          type: "text",
   410‚Üí          text: `# Semantic Analysis Error\n\nError: ${error.message}\n\n## Details\n- Analysis Type: ${analysis_type}\n- Provider: ${provider}\n- Content Length: ${content.length}\n- Has Context: ${!!context}\n- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}`,
   411‚Üí        },
   412‚Üí      ],
   413‚Üí    };
   414‚Üí  }
   415‚Üí}

   514‚Üíasync function handleExecuteWorkflow(args: any): Promise<any> {
   515‚Üí  const { workflow_name, parameters } = args;
   516‚Üí  
   517‚Üí  log(`Executing workflow: ${workflow_name}`, "info", { parameters });
   518‚Üí  
   519‚Üí  try {
   520‚Üí    // Initialize coordinator and execute real workflow
   521‚Üí    // Use repository_path from parameters or default to current directory
   522‚Üí    let repositoryPath = parameters?.repository_path || '.';
   523‚Üí    
   524‚Üí    // If we're running from the semantic analysis subdirectory, resolve the main repo path
   525‚Üí    if (repositoryPath === '.' && process.cwd().includes('mcp-server-semantic-analysis')) {
   526‚Üí      // Go up two levels from integrations/mcp-server-semantic-analysis to the main repo
   527‚Üí      repositoryPath = path.join(process.cwd(), '../..');
   528‚Üí    } else if (repositoryPath && !path.isAbsolute(repositoryPath)) {
   529‚Üí      // Make relative paths absolute
   530‚Üí      repositoryPath = path.resolve(repositoryPath);
   531‚Üí    }
   532‚Üí    
   533‚Üí    log(`Using repository path: ${repositoryPath}`, "info");
   534‚Üí    const coordinator = new CoordinatorAgent(repositoryPath);
   535‚Üí    const execution = await coordinator.executeWorkflow(workflow_name, parameters);
   536‚Üí    
   537‚Üí    // Format execution results
   538‚Üí    const statusEmoji = execution.status === "completed" ? "‚úÖ" : execution.status === "failed" ? "‚ùå" : "‚ö°";
   539‚Üí    const duration = execution.endTime ? 
   540‚Üí      `${Math.round((execution.endTime.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime()) / 1000)}s` : 
   541‚Üí      "ongoing";
   542‚Üí    
   543‚Üí    let resultText = `# Workflow Execution\n\n**Workflow:** ${workflow_name}\n**Status:** ${statusEmoji} ${execution.status}\n**Duration:** ${duration}\n**Steps:** ${execution.currentStep}/${execution.totalSteps}\n\n## Parameters\n${JSON.stringify(parameters || {}, null, 2)}\n\n`;
   544‚Üí    
   545‚Üí    // Add step results
   546‚Üí    if (Object.keys(execution.results).length > 0) {
   547‚Üí      resultText += "## Results\n";
   548‚Üí      for (const [step, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
   549‚Üí        resultText += `- **${step}**: ${typeof result === 'object' ? 'Completed' : result}\n`;
   550‚Üí      }
   551‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   552‚Üí    }
   553‚Üí    
   554‚Üí    // Add QA reports if available
   555‚Üí    const qaResults = execution.results.quality_assurance;
   556‚Üí    if (qaResults && qaResults.validations) {
   557‚Üí      resultText += "## <USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance\n";
   558‚Üí      for (const [stepName, qa] of Object.entries(qaResults.validations)) {
   559‚Üí        const qaReport = qa as any; // Type assertion for validation result
   560‚Üí        const <USER_ID_REDACTED> = qaReport.passed ? "‚úÖ" : "‚ùå";
   561‚Üí        resultText += `- **${stepName}**: ${<USER_ID_REDACTED>} ${qaReport.passed ? 'Passed' : 'Failed'}\n`;
   562‚Üí        if (qaReport.errors && qaReport.errors.length > 0) {
   563‚Üí          resultText += `  - Errors: ${qaReport.errors.join(', ')}\n`;
   564‚Üí        }
   565‚Üí        if (qaReport.warnings && qaReport.warnings.length > 0) {
   566‚Üí          resultText += `  - Warnings: ${qaReport.warnings.join(', ')}\n`;
   567‚Üí        }
   568‚Üí      }
   569‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   570‚Üí    }
   571‚Üí    
   572‚Üí    // Add errors if any
   573‚Üí    if (execution.errors.length > 0) {
   574‚Üí      resultText += "## Errors\n";
   575‚Üí      for (const error of execution.errors) {
   576‚Üí        resultText += `- ${error}\n`;
   577‚Üí      }
   578‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   579‚Üí    }
   580‚Üí    
   581‚Üí    // Add artifacts information
   582‚Üí    if (execution.status === "completed") {
   583‚Üí      resultText += "## Generated Artifacts\n";
   584‚Üí      resultText += "Check the following locations for generated files:\n";
   585‚Üí      resultText += "- `knowledge-management/insights/` - Insight documents\n";
   586‚Üí      resultText += "- `shared-memory-coding.json` - Updated knowledge base\n";
   587‚Üí      resultText += "- Generated PlantUML diagrams and documentation\n";
   588‚Üí    }
   589‚Üí    
   590‚Üí    return {
   591‚Üí      content: [
   592‚Üí        {
   593‚Üí          type: "text",
   594‚Üí          text: resultText,
   595‚Üí        },
   596‚Üí      ],
   597‚Üí    };
   598‚Üí    
   599‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   600‚Üí    log(`Workflow execution failed: ${workflow_name}`, "error", error);
   601‚Üí    return {
   602‚Üí      content: [
   603‚Üí        {
   604‚Üí          type: "text",
   605‚Üí          text: `# Workflow Execution Failed\n\n**Workflow:** ${workflow_name}\n**Error:** ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\n## Parameters\n${JSON.stringify(parameters || {}, null, 2)}`,
   606‚Üí        },
   607‚Üí      ],
   608‚Üí    };
   609‚Üí  }
   610‚Üí}

   612‚Üí// Helper functions for formatting documentation sections
   613‚Üífunction formatDetailedFindings(analysis: any): string {
   614‚Üí  if (!analysis) return "No detailed findings available.";
   615‚Üí  
   616‚Üí  const findings = [];
   617‚Üí  
   618‚Üí  // Add repository structure findings
   619‚Üí  if (analysis.structure) {
   620‚Üí    findings.push("### Repository Structure");
   621‚Üí    findings.push(analysis.structure);
   622‚Üí  }
   623‚Üí  
   624‚Üí  // Add key patterns
   625‚Üí  if (analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns) {
   626‚Üí    findings.push("\n### Key Patterns Identified");
   627‚Üí    const patterns = analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns;
   628‚Üí    if (Array.isArray(patterns)) {
   629‚Üí      patterns.forEach((pattern: string) => findings.push(`- ${pattern}`));
   630‚Üí    } else {
   631‚Üí      findings.push(patterns);
   632‚Üí    }
   633‚Üí  }
   634‚Üí  
   635‚Üí  // Add insights
   636‚Üí  if (analysis.insights) {
   637‚Üí    findings.push("\n### Architectural Insights");
   638‚Üí    findings.push(analysis.insights);
   639‚Üí  }
   640‚Üí  
   641‚Üí  return findings.join("\n") || "Analysis completed successfully.";
   642‚Üí}
   643‚Üí
   644‚Üífunction formatQualityMetrics(analysis: any): string {
   645‚Üí  const metrics = [];
   646‚Üí  
   647‚Üí  if (analysis.complexity || analysis.complexity_score) {
   648‚Üí    metrics.push(`- **Complexity Score**: ${analysis.complexity || analysis.complexity_score}/10`);
   649‚Üí  }
   650‚Üí  
   651‚Üí  if (analysis.files_analyzed) {
   652‚Üí    metrics.push(`- **Files Analyzed**: ${analysis.files_analyzed}`);
   653‚Üí  }
   654‚Üí  
   655‚Üí  if (analysis.patterns?.length) {
   656‚Üí    metrics.push(`- **Patterns Detected**: ${analysis.patterns.length}`);
   657‚Üí  }
   658‚Üí  
   659‚Üí  metrics.push(`- **Architecture Type**: ${analysis.architecture_type || "Not specified"}`);
   660‚Üí  metrics.push(`- **Maturity Level**: ${analysis.maturity || "Not assessed"}`);
   661‚Üí  
   662‚Üí  return metrics.join("\n") || "<USER_ID_REDACTED> metrics pending assessment.";
   663‚Üí}
   664‚Üí
   665‚Üífunction formatArchitectureInsights(analysis: any): string {
   666‚Üí  if (analysis.architecture_insights) {
   667‚Üí    return analysis.architecture_insights;
   668‚Üí  }
   669‚Üí  
   670‚Üí  const insights = [];

   672‚Üí  if (analysis.architecture_type) {

   675‚Üí  
   676‚Üí  if (analysis.key_patterns?.length) {

   681‚Üí  }
   682‚Üí  
   683‚Üí  return insights.join("\n") || "Architecture analysis pending.";
   684‚Üí}
   685‚Üí
   686‚Üífunction formatPatternAnalysis(analysis: any): string {
   687‚Üí  const patterns = [];

   689‚Üí  if (analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns) {
   690‚Üí    const patternList = analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns;

   696‚Üí        patterns.push("- **Usage**: Detected in multiple components");

   698‚Üí      });
   699‚Üí    }

   701‚Üí  
   702‚Üí  return patterns.join("\n") || "Pattern analysis in progress.";
   703‚Üí}
   704‚Üí
   705‚Üífunction formatRecommendations(analysis: any): string {
   706‚Üí  if (analysis.recommendations) {
   707‚Üí    return Array.isArray(analysis.recommendations) 
   708‚Üí      ? analysis.recommendations.map((r: any) => `- ${r}`).join("\n")
   709‚Üí      : analysis.recommendations;

   711‚Üí  
   712‚Üí  const recommendations = [
   713‚Üí    "1. **Documentation**: Enhance inline documentation for complex components",
   714‚Üí    "2. **Testing**: Increase test coverage for critical paths",
   715‚Üí    "3. **Architecture**: Consider implementing monitoring for distributed components",
   716‚Üí    "4. **Performance**: Optimize shared memory access patterns"
   717‚Üí  ];
   718‚Üí  
   719‚Üí  return recommendations.join("\n");
   720‚Üí}

   722‚Üífunction formatAppendices(analysis: any): string {

   740‚Üíasync function handleGenerateDocumentation(args: any): Promise<any> {
   741‚Üí  const { analysis_result, metadata } = args;
   742‚Üí  
   743‚Üí  log("Generating documentation with real file writing", "info", { has_metadata: !!metadata });
   744‚Üí  
   745‚Üí  try {
   746‚Üí    const docAgent = new InsightGenerationAgent();
   747‚Üí    
   748‚Üí    // Map the analysis result to the expected template variables
   749‚Üí    const documentationData = {
   750‚Üí      analysis_title: metadata?.title || analysis_result?.title || "Semantic Analysis Report",
   751‚Üí      scope: analysis_result?.scope || analysis_result?.repository_path || "Repository analysis",
   752‚Üí      duration: analysis_result?.duration || "Not measured",

   766‚Üí    };
   767‚Üí    
   768‚Üí    // Generate the documentation content
   769‚Üí    const docResult = await docAgent.generateDocumentation("analysis_documentation", documentationData);
   770‚Üí

   781‚Üí    log(`Documentation saved to file: ${outputPath}`, "info", {
   782‚Üí      title: docResult.title,

   785‚Üí    
   786‚Üí    return {

   788‚Üí        {
   789‚Üí          type: "text",
   790‚Üí          text: `# Generated Documentation\n\n**File Created:** ${outputPath}\n**Title:** ${docResult.title}\n**Size:** ${docResult.content.length} chars\n**Generated:** ${docResult.generatedAt}\n\n## Preview\n\n${docResult.content.substring(0, 500)}${docResult.content.length > 500 ? '...' : ''}`,
   791‚Üí        },
   792‚Üí      ],
   793‚Üí      metadata: {
   794‚Üí        filePath: outputPath,
   795‚Üí        fileSize: docResult.content.length,
   796‚Üí        title: docResult.title
   797‚Üí      }
   798‚Üí    };
   799‚Üí    
   800‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   801‚Üí    log("Failed to generate documentation", "error", error);
   802‚Üí    return {
   803‚Üí      content: [
   804‚Üí        {
   805‚Üí          type: "text",
   806‚Üí          text: `# Documentation Generation Failed\n\nError: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\nFalling back to basic documentation...`,
   807‚Üí        },
   808‚Üí      ],
   809‚Üí    };

   811‚Üí}

   831‚Üíasync function handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams(args: any): Promise<any> {
   832‚Üí  const { diagram_type, content, name, analysis_result } = args;
   833‚Üí  
   834‚Üí  // üîç TRACE: Log what arguments we received
   835‚Üí  log(`üîç DEBUG: handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams called with:`, "debug", {
   836‚Üí    diagram_type,
   837‚Üí    content,
   838‚Üí    name,
   839‚Üí    hasAnalysisResult: !!analysis_result,
   840‚Üí    analysisResultType: typeof analysis_result,
   841‚Üí    analysisResultKeys: analysis_result ? Object.keys(analysis_result) : [],
   842‚Üí    argsKeys: Object.keys(args)
   843‚Üí  });
   844‚Üí  
   845‚Üí  log(`Generating PlantUML diagram: ${name}`, "info", { diagram_type });
   846‚Üí  
   847‚Üí  // Use LLM-enhanced diagram generation instead of static templates
   848‚Üí  const insightAgent = new InsightGenerationAgent();
   849‚Üí  let diagramContent = '';
   850‚Üí  
   851‚Üí  try {
   852‚Üí    // Try LLM-enhanced generation first
   853‚Üí    log(`Attempting LLM-enhanced ${diagram_type} diagram generation`, "info");
   854‚Üí    
   855‚Üí    const dataForLLM = { 
   856‚Üí      patternCatalog: analysis_result,
   857‚Üí      content,
   858‚Üí      name 
   859‚Üí    };
   860‚Üí    
   861‚Üí    log(`üîç DEBUG: Data being passed to LLM:`, "debug", {
   862‚Üí      hasPatternCatalog: !!dataForLLM.patternCatalog,
   863‚Üí      patternCatalogType: typeof dataForLLM.patternCatalog,
   864‚Üí      content: dataForLLM.content,
   865‚Üí      name: dataForLLM.name
   866‚Üí    });
   867‚Üí    
   868‚Üí    diagramContent = await insightAgent.generateLLMEnhancedDiagram(diagram_type, dataForLLM);
   869‚Üí    
   870‚Üí    if (diagramContent && diagramContent.includes('@startuml')) {
   871‚Üí      log(`LLM-enhanced diagram generated successfully`, "info", { length: diagramContent.length });
   872‚Üí    } else {
   873‚Üí      log(`LLM-enhanced diagram generation failed, content: ${diagramContent}`, "warning");
   874‚Üí      throw new Error('LLM diagram generation failed - no valid PlantUML content');
   875‚Üí    }
   876‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   877‚Üí    log(`LLM diagram generation failed: ${error}`, "error");
   878‚Üí    return {
   879‚Üí      content: [
   880‚Üí        {
   881‚Üí          type: "text",
   882‚Üí          text: `‚ùå LLM-Enhanced PlantUML Generation Failed\n\n**Error:** ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\n**Diagram Type:** ${diagram_type}\n**Name:** ${name}\n\n**Root Cause:** The LLM provider could not generate repository-specific diagram content. This indicates either:\n1. Missing analysis data in the input\n2. LLM provider configuration issues\n3. Insufficient semantic analysis results\n\n**Solution:** Please check the semantic analysis results and ensure they contain meaningful patterns and components before attempting diagram generation.`
   883‚Üí        }
   884‚Üí      ],
   885‚Üí      isError: true,
   886‚Üí    };
   887‚Üí  }
   888‚Üí  
   889‚Üí  try {
   890‚Üí    // Set up directory structure
   891‚Üí    const insightsDir = process.env.KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH;
   892‚Üí    if (!insightsDir) {
   893‚Üí      throw new Error('KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH environment variable not set');
   894‚Üí    }
   895‚Üí    const pumlDir = path.join(insightsDir, 'puml');
   896‚Üí    const imagesDir = path.join(insightsDir, 'images');
   897‚Üí    
   898‚Üí    // Ensure directories exist
   899‚Üí    mkdirSync(pumlDir, { recursive: true });
   900‚Üí    mkdirSync(imagesDir, { recursive: true });
   901‚Üí    
   902‚Üí    // Generate lowercase filename for consistency
   903‚Üí    const fileBaseName = name.toLowerCase();
   904‚Üí    const pumlFile = path.join(pumlDir, `${fileBaseName}-${diagram_type}.puml`);
   905‚Üí    
   906‚Üí    // Write the PlantUML file
   907‚Üí    writeFileSync(pumlFile, diagramContent);
   908‚Üí    
   909‚Üí    log(`PlantUML file created: ${pumlFile}`, "info", {
   910‚Üí      name,
   911‚Üí      diagram_type,
   912‚Üí      fileSize: diagramContent.length
   913‚Üí    });
   914‚Üí    
   915‚Üí    // Generate PNG image using plantuml command
   916‚Üí    const pngFile = path.join(imagesDir, `${fileBaseName}-${diagram_type}.png`);
   917‚Üí    let pngGenerated = false;
   918‚Üí    
   919‚Üí    try {
   920‚Üí      const { exec } = await import('child_process');
   921‚Üí      const { promisify } = await import('util');
   922‚Üí      const execAsync = promisify(exec);
   923‚Üí      
   924‚Üí      // Use relative path to avoid nested directory creation
   925‚Üí      const relativePath = path.relative(path.dirname(pumlFile), imagesDir);
   926‚Üí      await execAsync(`plantuml -tpng "${pumlFile}" -o "${relativePath}"`);
   927‚Üí      pngGenerated = true;
   928‚Üí      
   929‚Üí      log(`PNG file generated: ${pngFile}`, "info", {
   930‚Üí        pumlFile,
   931‚Üí        pngFile
   932‚Üí      });
   933‚Üí      
   934‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   935‚Üí      log(`Failed to generate PNG: ${error}`, "warning", {
   936‚Üí        pumlFile,
   937‚Üí        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)
   938‚Üí      });
   939‚Üí    }
   940‚Üí    
   941‚Üí    return {
   942‚Üí      content: [
   943‚Üí        {
   944‚Üí          type: "text",
   945‚Üí          text: `# PlantUML Diagram Generated\n\n**PUML File:** ${pumlFile}\n**PNG File:** ${pngGenerated ? pngFile : 'Not generated'}\n**Type:** ${diagram_type}\n**Title:** ${content || name}\n**Size:** ${diagramContent.length} chars\n**Generated:** ${new Date().toISOString()}\n\n## Preview\n\`\`\`plantuml\n${diagramContent}\n\`\`\`\n\n${pngGenerated ? '‚úÖ PNG image successfully generated!' : '‚ö†Ô∏è PNG generation failed - check PlantUML installation'}`
   946‚Üí        }
   947‚Üí      ],
   948‚Üí      metadata: {
   949‚Üí        filePath: pumlFile,
   950‚Üí        fileSize: diagramContent.length,
   951‚Üí        diagramType: diagram_type
   952‚Üí      }
   953‚Üí    };
   954‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   955‚Üí    log(`Error generating PlantUML diagram`, "error", error);
   956‚Üí    throw error;
   957‚Üí  }
   958‚Üí}

   975‚Üí}
   976‚Üí
   977‚Üífunction generateArchitectureDiagram(title: string, analysis: any): string {
   978‚Üí  // Extract meaningful components from analysis data
   979‚Üí  let components = [];
   980‚Üí  
   981‚Üí  // Debug: log what we received
   982‚Üí  console.log(`üé® PlantUML generateArchitectureDiagram called:`, {
   983‚Üí    title,
   984‚Üí    hasAnalysis: !!analysis, 
   985‚Üí    hasSemanticInsights: !!analysis?.semanticInsights,
   986‚Üí    hasPatterns: !!analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns,
   987‚Üí    hasCommits: !!analysis?.commits,
   988‚Üí    hasArchDecisions: !!analysis?.architecturalDecisions,
   989‚Üí    analysisKeys: analysis ? Object.keys(analysis) : []
   990‚Üí  });
   991‚Üí  
   992‚Üí  log(`generateArchitectureDiagram called with analysis:`, 'debug', { 
   993‚Üí    hasAnalysis: !!analysis, 
   994‚Üí    hasSemanticInsights: !!analysis?.semanticInsights,
   995‚Üí    hasPatterns: !!analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns,
   996‚Üí    hasCommits: !!analysis?.commits,
   997‚Üí    hasArchDecisions: !!analysis?.architecturalDecisions,
   998‚Üí    analysisKeys: analysis ? Object.keys(analysis) : []
   999‚Üí  });
  1000‚Üí  
  1001‚Üí  // Try different sources for meaningful components
  1002‚Üí  if (analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns) {
  1003‚Üí    components = analysis.semanticInsights.patterns.map((p: any) => p.name || p.pattern).slice(0, 8);
  1004‚Üí    log(`Using semantic insights patterns:`, 'debug', components);
  1005‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.codeAnalysis?.patterns) {
  1006‚Üí    components = analysis.codeAnalysis.patterns.map((p: any) => p.name || p.pattern).slice(0, 8);
  1007‚Üí    log(`Using code analysis patterns:`, 'debug', components);
  1008‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.commits && analysis.commits.length > 0) {
  1009‚Üí    // Extract components from git commit messages and file changes
  1010‚Üí    const fileTypes = new Set<string>();
  1011‚Üí    analysis.commits.forEach((commit: any) => {
  1012‚Üí      if (commit.files) {
  1013‚Üí        commit.files.forEach((file: any) => {
  1014‚Üí          const fileName = typeof file === 'string' ? file : String(file);
  1015‚Üí          const ext = fileName.split('.').pop();
  1016‚Üí          if (ext) {
  1017‚Üí            if (ext.includes('ts') || ext.includes('js')) fileTypes.add('TypeScript/JavaScript Engine');
  1018‚Üí            if (ext.includes('json')) fileTypes.add('Configuration Manager');
  1019‚Üí            if (ext.includes('md')) fileTypes.add('Documentation System');
  1020‚Üí            if (fileName.includes('agent')) fileTypes.add('Agent Framework');
  1021‚Üí            if (fileName.includes('mcp')) fileTypes.add('MCP Protocol Handler');
  1022‚Üí          }
  1023‚Üí        });
  1024‚Üí      }
  1025‚Üí    });
  1026‚Üí    components = Array.from(fileTypes).slice(0, 6);
  1027‚Üí    log(`Using components from git commits:`, 'debug', components);
  1028‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.architecturalDecisions) {
  1029‚Üí    // Use architectural decisions as components
  1030‚Üí    components = analysis.architecturalDecisions.map((d: any) => d.component || d.area || 'System Component').slice(0, 6);
  1031‚Üí    log(`Using architectural decisions:`, 'debug', components);
  1032‚Üí  }
  1033‚Üí  
  1034‚Üí  // Fallback to meaningful default components if still empty
  1035‚Üí  if (components.length === 0) {
  1036‚Üí    components = [
  1037‚Üí      "Semantic Analysis Engine", 
  1038‚Üí      "Knowledge Management System", 
  1039‚Üí      "PlantUML Generator",
  1040‚Üí      "<USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance Agent",
  1041‚Üí      "MCP Protocol Handler"
  1042‚Üí    ];
  1043‚Üí  }
  1044‚Üí  
  1045‚Üí  const hasSharedMemory = components.some((p: string) => p.toLowerCase().includes("shared") || p.toLowerCase().includes("memory"));
  1046‚Üí  
  1047‚Üí  let diagram = `@startuml ${title.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-architecture
  1048‚Üí!theme plain
  1049‚Üítitle ${title} - Architecture Diagram
  1050‚Üí
  1051‚Üískinparam component {
  1052‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<service>> LightBlue
  1053‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<storage>> LightGreen
  1054‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<agent>> LightYellow
  1055‚Üí}
  1056‚Üí
  1057‚Üí`;
  1058‚Üí
  1059‚Üí  if (hasSharedMemory) {
  1060‚Üí    diagram += `package "Distributed System Architecture" {
  1061‚Üí  component "Service Orchestrator" as SO <<service>>
  1062‚Üí  component "Shared Memory Layer" as SM <<storage>>
  1063‚Üí  
  1064‚Üí  package "Domain Components" {
  1065‚Üí    component "UI Component" as UI <<agent>>

   314‚Üí        },
   315‚Üí      },
   316‚Üí    ];
   317‚Üí
   318‚Üí    workflows.forEach(workflow => {
   319‚Üí      this.workflows.set(workflow.name, workflow);
   320‚Üí    });
   321‚Üí
   322‚Üí    log(`Initialized ${workflows.length} workflows`, "info");
   323‚Üí  }

   375‚Üí  async executeWorkflow(workflowName: string, parameters: Record<string, any> = {}): Promise<WorkflowExecution> {
   376‚Üí    const workflow = this.workflows.get(workflowName);
   377‚Üí    if (!workflow) {
   378‚Üí      throw new Error(`Unknown workflow: ${workflowName}`);
   379‚Üí    }
   380‚Üí
   381‚Üí    const executionId = `${workflowName}-${Date.now()}`;
   382‚Üí    const execution: WorkflowExecution = {
   383‚Üí      id: executionId,
   384‚Üí      workflow: workflowName,
   385‚Üí      status: "pending",
   386‚Üí      startTime: new Date(),
   387‚Üí      results: {},
   388‚Üí      errors: [],
   389‚Üí      currentStep: 0,
   390‚Üí      totalSteps: workflow.steps.length,
   391‚Üí    };
   392‚Üí
   393‚Üí    this.executions.set(executionId, execution);
   394‚Üí
   395‚Üí    log(`Starting workflow execution: ${executionId}`, "info", {
   396‚Üí      workflow: workflowName,
   397‚Üí      parameters,
   398‚Üí      totalSteps: workflow.steps.length,
   399‚Üí    });
   400‚Üí
   401‚Üí    try {
   402‚Üí      execution.status = "running";
   403‚Üí      
   404‚Üí      // Execute workflow steps
   405‚Üí      for (let i = 0; i < workflow.steps.length; i++) {
   406‚Üí        execution.currentStep = i;
   407‚Üí        const step = workflow.steps[i];
   408‚Üí        
   409‚Üí        // Check dependencies
   410‚Üí        if (step.dependencies) {
   411‚Üí          for (const dep of step.dependencies) {
   412‚Üí            if (!execution.results[dep] || execution.results[dep].error) {
   413‚Üí              throw new Error(`Step dependency not satisfied: ${dep}`);
   414‚Üí            }
   415‚Üí          }
   416‚Üí        }
   417‚Üí        
   418‚Üí        // Execute step with timing tracking
   419‚Üí        const stepStartTime = new Date();
   420‚Üí        try {
   421‚Üí          const stepResult = await this.executeStepWithTimeout(execution, step, parameters);
   422‚Üí          const stepEndTime = new Date();
   423‚Üí          const stepDuration = stepEndTime.getTime() - stepStartTime.getTime();
   424‚Üí          
   425‚Üí          // Store timing information with result
   426‚Üí          execution.results[step.name] = {
   427‚Üí            ...stepResult,
   428‚Üí            _timing: {
   429‚Üí              startTime: stepStartTime,
   430‚Üí              endTime: stepEndTime,
   431‚Üí              duration: stepDuration,
   432‚Üí              timeout: step.timeout || 60
   433‚Üí            }
   434‚Üí          };
   435‚Üí          
   436‚Üí          log(`Step completed: ${step.name}`, "info", {
   437‚Üí            step: step.name,
   438‚Üí            agent: step.agent,
   439‚Üí            hasResult: !!stepResult,
   440‚Üí            duration: `${(stepDuration / 1000).toFixed(1)}s`,
   441‚Üí            timeoutUtilization: `${((stepDuration / 1000) / (step.timeout || 60) * 100).toFixed(1)}%`
   442‚Üí          });
   443‚Üí
   444‚Üí          // QA Enforcement: Check <USER_ID_REDACTED> assurance results and implement retry logic
   445‚Üí          if (step.name === 'quality_assurance' && stepResult) {
   446‚Üí            const qaFailures = this.validateQualityAssuranceResults(stepResult);
   447‚Üí            if (qaFailures.length > 0) {
   448‚Üí              log(`QA Enforcement: <USER_ID_REDACTED> issues detected, attempting intelligent retry`, "warning", {
   449‚Üí                failures: qaFailures,
   450‚Üí                step: step.name,
   451‚Üí                workflow: execution.workflow
   452‚Üí              });
   453‚Üí              
   454‚Üí              // Attempt to fix the issues by retrying failed steps with enhanced parameters
   455‚Üí              const retryResult = await this.attemptQARecovery(qaFailures, execution, workflow);
   456‚Üí              
   457‚Üí              if (!retryResult.success) {
   458‚Üí                const <USER_ID_REDACTED> = `<USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance failed after retry with ${retryResult.remainingFailures.length} critical issues: ${retryResult.remainingFailures.join(', ')}`;
   459‚Üí                log(`QA Enforcement: Halting workflow after retry attempt`, "error", {
   460‚Üí                  failures: retryResult.remainingFailures,
   461‚Üí                  step: step.name,
   462‚Üí                  workflow: execution.workflow
   463‚Üí                });
   464‚Üí                throw new Error(<USER_ID_REDACTED>);
   465‚Üí              }
   466‚Üí              
   467‚Üí              log(`QA Enforcement: <USER_ID_REDACTED> validation passed after retry`, "info");
   468‚Üí            } else {
   469‚Üí              log(`QA Enforcement: <USER_ID_REDACTED> validation passed`, "info");
   470‚Üí            }
   471‚Üí          }
   472‚Üí          
   473‚Üí        } catch (error) {
   474‚Üí          const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error);
   475‚Üí          execution.results[step.name] = { error: errorMessage };
   476‚Üí          execution.errors.push(`Step ${step.name} failed: ${errorMessage}`);
   477‚Üí          
   478‚Üí          log(`Step failed: ${step.name}`, "error", {
   479‚Üí            step: step.name,
   480‚Üí            agent: step.agent,
   481‚Üí            error: errorMessage
   482‚Üí          });
   483‚Üí          
   484‚Üí          // Stop workflow on step failure
   485‚Üí          throw error;
   486‚Üí        }
   487‚Üí      }
   488‚Üí
   489‚Üí      execution.status = "completed";
   490‚Üí      execution.endTime = new Date();
   491‚Üí      
   492‚Üí      // Save successful workflow completion checkpoint
   493‚Üí      try {
   494‚Üí        const persistenceAgent = this.agents.get('persistence') as PersistenceAgent;
   495‚Üí        if (persistenceAgent && persistenceAgent.saveSuccessfulWorkflowCompletion) {
   496‚Üí          await persistenceAgent.saveSuccessfulWorkflowCompletion(workflowName, execution.endTime);
   497‚Üí          log('Workflow completion checkpoint saved', 'info', { workflow: workflowName });
   498‚Üí        }
   499‚Üí      } catch (checkpointError) {
   500‚Üí        log('Failed to save workflow completion checkpoint', 'warning', checkpointError);
   501‚Üí        // Don't fail the workflow for checkpoint issues
   502‚Üí      }
   503‚Üí      
   504‚Üí      // Generate summary with enhanced timing analysis
   505‚Üí      const summary = this.generateWorkflowSummary(execution, workflow);
   506‚Üí      const performanceMetrics = this.analyzeWorkflowPerformance(execution);
   507‚Üí      
   508‚Üí      log(`Workflow completed: ${executionId}`, "info", {
   509‚Üí        duration: execution.endTime.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime(),
   510‚Üí        stepsCompleted: execution.currentStep + 1,
   511‚Üí        performanceScore: performanceMetrics.overallScore,
   512‚Üí        bottlenecks: performanceMetrics.bottlenecks,
   513‚Üí        summary
   514‚Üí      });
   515‚Üí      
   516‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   517‚Üí      execution.status = "failed";
   518‚Üí      execution.endTime = new Date();
   519‚Üí      execution.errors.push(error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error));
   520‚Üí      
   521‚Üí      // ROLLBACK: Attempt to rollback changes if critical failure occurred
   522‚Üí      if (execution.rollbackActions && execution.rollbackActions.length > 0) {
   523‚Üí        log(`Attempting rollback due to workflow failure: ${executionId}`, "warning", {
   524‚Üí          rollbackActionsCount: execution.rollbackActions.length,
   525‚Üí          error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)
   526‚Üí        });
   527‚Üí        
   528‚Üí        try {
   529‚Üí          await this.performRollback(execution);
   530‚Üí          execution.rolledBack = true;
   531‚Üí          log(`Rollback completed successfully for: ${executionId}`, "info");
   532‚Üí        } catch (rollbackError) {
   533‚Üí          log(`Rollback failed for: ${executionId}`, "error", rollbackError);
   534‚Üí          execution.errors.push(`Rollback failed: ${rollbackError instanceof Error ? rollbackError.message : String(rollbackError)}`);
   535‚Üí        }
   536‚Üí      }
   537‚Üí      
   538‚Üí      log(`Workflow failed: ${executionId}`, "error", {
   539‚Üí        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error),
   540‚Üí        currentStep: execution.currentStep,
   541‚Üí        duration: execution.endTime.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime(),
   542‚Üí        rolledBack: execution.rolledBack || false
   543‚Üí      });
   544‚Üí    }
   545‚Üí
   546‚Üí    return execution;
   547‚Üí  }
   548‚Üí
   549‚Üí  private async executeStepWithTimeout(
   550‚Üí    execution: WorkflowExecution,
   551‚Üí    step: WorkflowStep,
   552‚Üí    globalParams: Record<string, any>
   553‚Üí  ): Promise<any> {
   554‚Üí    log(`Executing step: ${step.name}`, "info", {
   555‚Üí      agent: step.agent,
   556‚Üí      action: step.action,
   557‚Üí      timeout: step.timeout || 60,
   558‚Üí    });
   559‚Üí
   560‚Üí    const stepTimeout = (step.timeout || 60) * 1000;
   561‚Üí    const stepParams = { ...step.parameters, ...globalParams };
   562‚Üí
   563‚Üí    // Resolve template placeholders in parameters
   564‚Üí    this.resolveParameterTemplates(stepParams, execution.results);
   565‚Üí
   566‚Üí    // Add execution context
   567‚Üí    stepParams._context = {
   568‚Üí      workflow: execution.workflow,
   569‚Üí      executionId: execution.id,
   570‚Üí      previousResults: execution.results,
   571‚Üí      step: step.name
   572‚Üí    };
   573‚Üí
   574‚Üí    const timeoutPromise = new Promise((_, reject) => {
   575‚Üí      setTimeout(() => reject(new Error(`Step timeout after ${step.timeout || 60}s`)), stepTimeout);
   576‚Üí    });
   577‚Üí
   578‚Üí    const executionPromise = this.executeStepOperation(step, stepParams, execution);
   579‚Üí
   580‚Üí    try {
   581‚Üí      return await Promise.race([executionPromise, timeoutPromise]);
   582‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   583‚Üí      log(`Step failed: ${step.name}`, "error", {
   584‚Üí        agent: step.agent,
   585‚Üí        action: step.action,
   586‚Üí        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error),
   587‚Üí      });
   588‚Üí      throw error;
   589‚Üí    }
   590‚Üí  }
   591‚Üí
   592‚Üí  private async executeStepOperation(step: WorkflowStep, parameters: Record<string, any>, execution: WorkflowExecution): Promise<any> {
   593‚Üí    const agent = this.agents.get(step.agent);
   594‚Üí    
   595‚Üí    if (!agent) {
   596‚Üí      const error = `Agent not found: ${step.agent}. Available agents: ${Array.from(this.agents.keys()).join(', ')}`;
   597‚Üí      log(error, "error");
   598‚Üí      throw new Error(error);
   599‚Üí    }
   600‚Üí
   601‚Üí    if (typeof agent[step.action] !== 'function') {
   602‚Üí      const availableMethods = Object.getOwnPropertyNames(Object.getPrototypeOf(agent))
   603‚Üí        .filter(name => typeof agent[name] === 'function' && name !== 'constructor');
   604‚Üí      const error = `Action ${step.action} not found on agent ${step.agent}. Available methods: ${availableMethods.join(', ')}`;
   605‚Üí      log(error, "error");
   606‚Üí      throw new Error(error);
   607‚Üí    }
   608‚Üí
   609‚Üí    try {
   610‚Üí      log(`Executing agent method: ${step.agent}.${step.action}`, "info", {
   611‚Üí        agent: step.agent,
   612‚Üí        action: step.action,
   613‚Üí        parameters: Object.keys(parameters)
   614‚Üí      });
   615‚Üí      
   616‚Üí      const result = await agent[step.action](parameters);
   617‚Üí      
   618‚Üí      log(`Agent method completed: ${step.agent}.${step.action}`, "info", {
   619‚Üí        resultType: typeof result,
   620‚Üí        hasResult: !!result
   621‚Üí      });
   622‚Üí      
   623‚Üí      return result;
   624‚Üí      
   625‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   626‚Üí      log(`Agent method failed: ${step.agent}.${step.action}`, "error", {
   627‚Üí        agent: step.agent,
   628‚Üí        action: step.action,
   629‚Üí        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error),
   630‚Üí        stack: error instanceof Error ? error.stack : undefined
   631‚Üí      });
   632‚Üí      throw error;
   633‚Üí    }
   634‚Üí  }
   635‚Üí
   636‚Üí  /**
   637‚Üí   * Resolve template placeholders in parameters like {{step_name.result}}
   638‚Üí   */
   639‚Üí  private resolveParameterTemplates(parameters: Record<string, any>, results: Record<string, any>): void {
   640‚Üí    for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(parameters)) {
   641‚Üí      if (typeof value === 'string' && value.startsWith('{{') && value.endsWith('}}')) {
   642‚Üí        const template = value.slice(2, -2); // Remove {{ and }}
   643‚Üí        const [stepName, property = 'result'] = template.split('.');
   644‚Üí        
   645‚Üí        if (results[stepName] && !results[stepName].error) {
   646‚Üí          const resolvedValue = property === 'result' ? results[stepName] : results[stepName][property];
   647‚Üí          parameters[key] = resolvedValue;
   648‚Üí          
   649‚Üí          log(`Resolved template: ${value} -> ${typeof resolvedValue}`, "debug", {
   650‚Üí            template: value,
   651‚Üí            stepName,
   652‚Üí            property,
   653‚Üí            resolvedType: typeof resolvedValue
   654‚Üí          });
   655‚Üí        } else {
   656‚Üí          log(`Failed to resolve template: ${value} - step not found or failed`, "warning", {
   657‚Üí            template: value,
   658‚Üí            stepName,
   659‚Üí            availableSteps: Object.keys(results)
   660‚Üí          });
   661‚Üí          parameters[key] = null;
   662‚Üí        }
   663‚Üí      } else if (typeof value === 'object' && value !== null) {
   664‚Üí        // Recursively resolve nested objects
   665‚Üí        this.resolveParameterTemplates(value, results);
   666‚Üí      }
   667‚Üí    }
   668‚Üí  }
   669‚Üí
   670‚Üí  /**
   671‚Üí   * Perform rollback of workflow changes
   672‚Üí   */
   673‚Üí  private async performRollback(execution: WorkflowExecution): Promise<void> {
   674‚Üí    if (!execution.rollbackActions) return;
   675‚Üí    
   676‚Üí    // Reverse order rollback (last actions first)
   677‚Üí    const reversedActions = [...execution.rollbackActions].reverse();
   678‚Üí    
   679‚Üí    for (const action of reversedActions) {
   680‚Üí      try {
   681‚Üí        switch (action.type) {
   682‚Üí          case 'file_created':
   683‚Üí            // Remove created file
   684‚Üí            if (fs.existsSync(action.target)) {
   685‚Üí              fs.unlinkSync(action.target);
   686‚Üí              log(`Rollback: Removed created file ${action.target}`, 'info');
   687‚Üí            }
   688‚Üí            break;
   689‚Üí            
   690‚Üí          case 'file_modified':
   691‚Üí            // Restore original file content
   692‚Üí            if (action.originalState) {
   693‚Üí              fs.writeFileSync(action.target, action.originalState, 'utf8');
   694‚Üí              log(`Rollback: Restored file ${action.target}`, 'info');
   695‚Üí            }
   696‚Üí            break;
   697‚Üí            
   698‚Üí          case 'entity_created':
   699‚Üí            // Remove entity from shared memory (requires persistence agent)
   700‚Üí            const persistenceAgent = this.agents.get('persistence');
   701‚Üí            if (persistenceAgent && typeof persistenceAgent.removeEntity === 'function') {
   702‚Üí              await persistenceAgent.removeEntity(action.target);
   703‚Üí              log(`Rollback: Removed entity ${action.target}`, 'info');
   704‚Üí            }
   705‚Üí            break;
   706‚Üí        }
   707‚Üí      } catch (rollbackError) {
   708‚Üí        log(`Rollback action failed for ${action.type}:${action.target}`, 'error', rollbackError);
   709‚Üí        // Continue with other rollback actions even if one fails
   710‚Üí      }
   711‚Üí    }
   712‚Üí  }
   713‚Üí
   714‚Üí  /**
   715‚Üí   * Validate <USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance results and return critical failures
   716‚Üí   */
   717‚Üí  private validateQualityAssuranceResults(qaResult: any): string[] {
   718‚Üí    const criticalFailures: string[] = [];
   719‚Üí    
   720‚Üí    if (!qaResult || !qaResult.validations) {
   721‚Üí      criticalFailures.push("No QA validations found");
   722‚Üí      return criticalFailures;
   723‚Üí    }
   724‚Üí
   725‚Üí    // Check each step's QA validation
   726‚Üí    for (const [stepName, validation] of Object.entries(qaResult.validations)) {
   727‚Üí      const val = validation as any;
   728‚Üí      
   729‚Üí      // Critical failure conditions
   730‚Üí      if (!val.passed) {
   731‚Üí        if (val.errors && val.errors.length > 0) {
   732‚Üí          // Focus on specific critical errors
   733‚Üí          const criticalErrors = val.errors.filter((error: string) => 
   734‚Üí            error.includes('Missing insights') || 
   735‚Üí            error.includes('phantom node') ||
   736‚Üí            error.includes('file not found') ||
   737‚Üí            error.includes('broken filename')
   738‚Üí          );
   739‚Üí          if (criticalErrors.length > 0) {
   740‚Üí            criticalFailures.push(`${stepName}: ${criticalErrors.join(', ')}`);
   741‚Üí          }
   742‚Üí        }
   743‚Üí        
   744‚Üí        // Check <USER_ID_REDACTED> score threshold
   745‚Üí        if (val.score !== undefined && val.score < 60) {
   746‚Üí          criticalFailures.push(`${stepName}: <USER_ID_REDACTED> score too low (${val.score}/100)`);
   747‚Üí        }
   748‚Üí      }
   749‚Üí    }
   750‚Üí
   751‚Üí    // Overall QA score check
   752‚Üí    if (qaResult.overallScore !== undefined && qaResult.overallScore < 70) {
   753‚Üí      criticalFailures.push(`Overall QA score below threshold (${qaResult.overallScore}/100)`);
   754‚Üí    }
   755‚Üí
   756‚Üí    return criticalFailures;
   757‚Üí  }
   758‚Üí
   759‚Üí  /**
   760‚Üí   * Attempt to recover from QA failures by retrying failed steps with enhanced parameters
   761‚Üí   */
   762‚Üí  private async attemptQARecovery(
   763‚Üí    failures: string[],
   764‚Üí    execution: WorkflowExecution,
   765‚Üí    workflow: WorkflowDefinition
   766‚Üí  ): Promise<{ success: boolean; remainingFailures: string[] }> {
   767‚Üí    log('Attempting QA recovery', 'info', { failures });
   768‚Üí    
   769‚Üí    const remainingFailures: string[] = [];
   770‚Üí    const failedSteps = new Set<string>();
   771‚Üí    
   772‚Üí    // Identify which steps need retry based on failures
   773‚Üí    failures.forEach(failure => {
   774‚Üí      const [stepName] = failure.split(':');
   775‚Üí      if (stepName) {
   776‚Üí        failedSteps.add(stepName.trim());
   777‚Üí      }
   778‚Üí    });
   779‚Üí    
   780‚Üí    // Retry each failed step with enhanced parameters
   781‚Üí    for (const stepName of failedSteps) {
   782‚Üí      const step = workflow.steps.find(s => s.name === stepName);
   783‚Üí      if (!step) continue;
   784‚Üí      
   785‚Üí      try {
   786‚Üí        log(`Retrying step ${stepName} with enhanced parameters`, 'info');
   787‚Üí        
   788‚Üí        // Build enhanced parameters based on the failure type
   789‚Üí        const enhancedParams = this.buildEnhancedParameters(stepName, failures, execution);
   790‚Üí        
   791‚Üí        // Get the agent and retry the action
   792‚Üí        const agent = this.agents.get(step.agent);
   793‚Üí        if (!agent) {
   794‚Üí          throw new Error(`Agent ${step.agent} not found`);
   795‚Üí        }
   796‚Üí        
   797‚Üí        const action = (agent as any)[step.action];
   798‚Üí        if (!action) {
   799‚Üí          throw new Error(`Action ${step.action} not found on agent ${step.agent}`);
   800‚Üí        }
   801‚Üí        
   802‚Üí        // Retry with enhanced parameters
   803‚Üí        const retryResult = await action.call(agent, enhancedParams);
   804‚Üí        
   805‚Üí        // Update execution results
   806‚Üí        execution.results[stepName] = retryResult;
   807‚Üí        
   808‚Üí        log(`Successfully retried step ${stepName}`, 'info');
   809‚Üí        
   810‚Üí      } catch (retryError) {
   811‚Üí        const errorMsg = retryError instanceof Error ? retryError.message : String(retryError);
   812‚Üí        remainingFailures.push(`${stepName}: ${errorMsg} (after retry)`);
   813‚Üí        log(`Failed to retry step ${stepName}`, 'error', { error: errorMsg });
   814‚Üí      }
   815‚Üí    }
   816‚Üí    
   817‚Üí    // Re-run QA to check if issues are resolved
   818‚Üí    if (remainingFailures.length === 0) {
   819‚Üí      try {
   820‚Üí        const qaStep = workflow.steps.find(s => s.name === 'quality_assurance');
   821‚Üí        if (qaStep) {
   822‚Üí          const <USER_ID_REDACTED> = this.agents.get(qaStep.agent);
   823‚Üí          if (<USER_ID_REDACTED>) {
   824‚Üí            const qaAction = (<USER_ID_REDACTED> as any)[qaStep.action];
   825‚Üí            if (qaAction) {
   826‚Üí              const qaParams = { ...qaStep.parameters };
   827‚Üí              this.resolveParameterTemplates(qaParams, execution.results);
   828‚Üí              qaParams._context = {
   829‚Üí                workflow: execution.workflow,
   830‚Üí                executionId: execution.id,
   831‚Üí                previousResults: execution.results,
   832‚Üí                step: qaStep.name
   833‚Üí              };
   834‚Üí              const newQaResult = await qaAction.call(<USER_ID_REDACTED>, qaParams);
   835‚Üí              
   836‚Üí              // Validate the new QA results
   837‚Üí              const newFailures = this.validateQualityAssuranceResults(newQaResult);
   838‚Üí              if (newFailures.length > 0) {
   839‚Üí                remainingFailures.push(...newFailures);
   840‚Üí              }
   841‚Üí            }
   842‚Üí          }
   843‚Üí        }
   844‚Üí      } catch (<USER_ID_REDACTED>) {
   845‚Üí        log('Failed to re-run QA after retry', 'error', <USER_ID_REDACTED>);
   846‚Üí      }
   847‚Üí    }
   848‚Üí    
   849‚Üí    return {
   850‚Üí      success: remainingFailures.length === 0,
   851‚Üí      remainingFailures
   852‚Üí    };
   853‚Üí  }
   854‚Üí
   855‚Üí  /**
   856‚Üí   * Build enhanced parameters for retry based on failure analysis
   857‚Üí   */
   858‚Üí  private buildEnhancedParameters(
   859‚Üí    stepName: string,
   860‚Üí    failures: string[],
   861‚Üí    execution: WorkflowExecution
   862‚Üí  ): any {
   863‚Üí    const baseParams = execution.results[stepName]?._parameters || {};
   864‚Üí    const enhancedParams = { ...baseParams };
   865‚Üí    
   866‚Üí    // Analyze failures to determine enhancement strategy
   867‚Üí    const stepFailures = failures.filter(f => f.startsWith(`${stepName}:`));
   868‚Üí    
   869‚Üí    if (stepName === 'semantic_analysis') {
   870‚Üí      // If semantic analysis failed due to missing insights, enhance the analysis depth
   871‚Üí      if (stepFailures.some(f => f.includes('Missing insights'))) {
   872‚Üí        enhancedParams.analysisDepth = 'comprehensive';
   873‚Üí        enhancedParams.includeDetailedInsights = true;
   874‚Üí        enhancedParams.minInsightLength = 200;
   875‚Üí      }
   876‚Üí    } else if (stepName === 'insight_generation') {
   877‚Üí      // If insight generation failed, request more detailed insights
   878‚Üí      enhancedParams.generateDetailedInsights = true;
   879‚Üí      enhancedParams.includeCodeExamples = true;
   880‚Üí      enhancedParams.minPatternSignificance = 5;
   881‚Üí    } else if (stepName === 'web_search') {
   882‚Üí      // If web search failed, try with broader search parameters
   883‚Üí      enhancedParams.searchDepth = 'comprehensive';
   884‚Üí      enhancedParams.includeAlternativePatterns = true;
   885‚Üí    }
   886‚Üí    
   887‚Üí    // Add retry context to help agents understand they're in a retry
   888‚Üí    enhancedParams._retryContext = {
   889‚Üí      isRetry: true,
   890‚Üí      previousFailures: stepFailures,
   891‚Üí      enhancementReason: 'QA validation failure'
   892‚Üí    };
   893‚Üí    
   894‚Üí    return enhancedParams;
   895‚Üí  }
   896‚Üí
   897‚Üí  /**
   898‚Üí   * Generate detailed analysis of what each step did and decided
   899‚Üí   */
   900‚Üí  private generateDetailedStepAnalysis(execution: WorkflowExecution): string {
   901‚Üí    const analysis: string[] = [];
   902‚Üí    
   903‚Üí    for (const [stepName, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
   904‚Üí      if (result.error) {
   905‚Üí        analysis.push(`### ${stepName} - ‚ùå FAILED\n**Error:** ${result.error}`);
   906‚Üí        continue;
   907‚Üí      }
   908‚Üí      
   909‚Üí      let stepDetails = `### ${stepName} - ‚úÖ SUCCESS\n`;
   910‚Üí      
   911‚Üí      // Add specific analysis based on step type
   912‚Üí      switch (stepName) {
   913‚Üí        case 'persist_results':
   914‚Üí          if (result.entitiesCreated || result.filesCreated) {
   915‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Entities Created:** ${result.entitiesCreated || 0}\n`;
   916‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Files Created:** ${result.filesCreated?.length || 0}\n`;
   917‚Üí            if (result.filesCreated?.length > 0) {
   918‚Üí              stepDetails += `**Files:** ${result.filesCreated.join(', ')}\n`;
   919‚Üí            }
   920‚Üí          }
   921‚Üí          break;
   922‚Üí          
   923‚Üí        case 'deduplicate_insights':
   924‚Üí          if (result.duplicatesFound !== undefined) {
   925‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Duplicates Found:** ${result.duplicatesFound}\n`;
   926‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Entities Merged:** ${result.entitiesMerged || 0}\n`;
   927‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Processing Time:** ${result.processingTime || 'Unknown'}\n`;
   928‚Üí          }
   929‚Üí          break;
   930‚Üí          
   931‚Üí        case 'quality_assurance':
   932‚Üí          if (result.validations) {
   933‚Üí            const passed = Object.values(result.validations).filter((v: any) => v.passed).length;
   934‚Üí            const total = Object.keys(result.validations).length;
   935‚Üí            stepDetails += `**QA Validations:** ${passed}/${total} passed\n`;
   936‚Üí            if (result.overallScore) {
   937‚Üí              stepDetails += `**Overall Score:** ${result.overallScore}/100\n`;
   938‚Üí            }
   939‚Üí          }
   940‚Üí          break;
   941‚Üí          
   942‚Üí        case 'generate_insights':
   943‚Üí          if (result.insights_generated) {
   944‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Insights Generated:** ${result.insights_generated}\n`;
   945‚Üí          }
   946‚Üí          if (result.filename) {
   947‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Generated File:** ${result.filename}\n`;
   948‚Üí          }
   949‚Üí          break;
   950‚Üí      }
   951‚Üí      
   952‚Üí      // Add timing information
   953‚Üí      if (result._timing) {
   954‚Üí        const duration = (result._timing.duration / 1000).toFixed(1);
   955‚Üí        const utilization = ((result._timing.duration / 1000) / result._timing.timeout * 100).toFixed(1);
   956‚Üí        stepDetails += `**Timing:** ${duration}s (${utilization}% of ${result._timing.timeout}s timeout)\n`;
   957‚Üí      }
   958‚Üí      
   959‚Üí      analysis.push(stepDetails);
   960‚Üí    }
   961‚Üí    
   962‚Üí    return analysis.join('\n');
   963‚Üí  }

   965‚Üí  private generateWorkflowSummary(execution: WorkflowExecution, workflow: WorkflowDefinition): string {
   966‚Üí    const successfulSteps = Object.entries(execution.results)
   967‚Üí      .filter(([_, result]) => !result.error)
   968‚Üí      .length;
   969‚Üí    
   970‚Üí    const summary = `
   971‚Üí# Workflow Execution
   972‚Üí
   973‚Üí**Workflow:** ${workflow.name}
   974‚Üí**Status:** ${execution.status === 'completed' ? '‚úÖ' : '‚ùå'} ${execution.status}
   975‚Üí**Duration:** ${Math.round((execution.endTime?.getTime() || Date.now()) - execution.startTime.getTime()) / 1000}s
   976‚Üí**Steps:** ${successfulSteps}/${workflow.steps.length}
   977‚Üí
   978‚Üí## Results
   979‚Üí${workflow.steps.map(step => {
   980‚Üí  const result = execution.results[step.name];
   981‚Üí  const status = result?.error ? '‚ùå' : '‚úÖ';
   982‚Üí  const timing = result?._timing ? ` (${(result._timing.duration / 1000).toFixed(1)}s)` : '';
   983‚Üí  return `- **${step.name}**: ${status} ${result?.error ? 'Failed' : 'Completed'}${timing}`;
   984‚Üí}).join('\n')}
   985‚Üí
   986‚Üí## Detailed Step Analysis
   987‚Üí${this.generateDetailedStepAnalysis(execution)}
   988‚Üí
   989‚Üí${workflow.config.quality_validation ? `
   990‚Üí## <USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance
   991‚Üí${workflow.steps.map(step => {
   992‚Üí  const qaResult = execution.results.quality_assurance?.validations?.[step.name];
   993‚Üí  if (!qaResult) return '';
   994‚Üí  const status = qaResult.passed ? '‚úÖ' : '‚ùå';
   995‚Üí  return `- **${step.name}**: ${status} ${qaResult.passed ? 'Passed' : 'Failed'}`;
   996‚Üí}).filter(Boolean).join('\n')}
   997‚Üí` : ''}
   998‚Üí
   999‚Üí## Generated Artifacts
  1000‚ÜíCheck the following locations for generated files:
  1001‚Üí- \`knowledge-management/insights/\` - Insight documents
  1002‚Üí- \`shared-memory-coding.json\` - Updated knowledge base
  1003‚Üí- Generated PlantUML diagrams and documentation
  1004‚Üí`;
  1005‚Üí    
  1006‚Üí    return summary.trim();
  1007‚Üí  }

  1009‚Üí  private analyzeWorkflowPerformance(execution: WorkflowExecution): {
  1010‚Üí    overallScore: number;
  1011‚Üí    bottlenecks: string[];
  1012‚Üí    efficiency: number;
  1013‚Üí    recommendations: string[];
  1014‚Üí  } {
  1015‚Üí    const bottlenecks: string[] = [];
  1016‚Üí    const recommendations: string[] = [];
  1017‚Üí    
  1018‚Üí    const totalDuration = execution.endTime!.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime();
  1019‚Üí    const totalSeconds = totalDuration / 1000;
  1020‚Üí    
  1021‚Üí    // Analyze step performance
  1022‚Üí    const stepTimings: Array<{ name: string; duration: number; timeout: number }> = [];
  1023‚Üí    
  1024‚Üí    for (const [stepName, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
  1025‚Üí      if (result?._timing) {
  1026‚Üí        const duration = result._timing.duration / 1000;
  1027‚Üí        const timeout = result._timing.timeout;
  1028‚Üí        stepTimings.push({ name: stepName, duration, timeout });
  1029‚Üí        
  1030‚Üí        // Identify bottlenecks
  1031‚Üí        if (duration > timeout * 0.8) {
  1032‚Üí          bottlenecks.push(`${stepName} (${duration.toFixed(1)}s/${timeout}s)`);
  1033‚Üí        }
  1034‚Üí        
  1035‚Üí        // Performance-based recommendations
  1036‚Üí        if (duration > 180) { // > 3 minutes
  1037‚Üí          recommendations.push(`Optimize ${stepName} - took ${duration.toFixed(1)}s`);
  1038‚Üí        }
  1039‚Üí      }
  1040‚Üí    }
  1041‚Üí    
  1042‚Üí    // Calculate efficiency score
  1043‚Üí    const totalStepTime = stepTimings.reduce((sum, step) => sum + step.duration, 0);
  1044‚Üí    const efficiency = totalStepTime > 0 ? (totalSeconds / totalStepTime) * 100 : 100;
  1045‚Üí    
  1046‚Üí    // Overall performance score
  1047‚Üí    let score = 100;
  1048‚Üí    
  1049‚Üí    // Penalize long workflows
  1050‚Üí    if (totalSeconds > 900) score -= 30; // > 15 minutes
  1051‚Üí    else if (totalSeconds > 600) score -= 15; // > 10 minutes
  1052‚Üí    
  1053‚Üí    // Penalize bottlenecks
  1054‚Üí    score -= bottlenecks.length * 10;
  1055‚Üí    
  1056‚Üí    // Penalize low efficiency (too much parallel overhead)
  1057‚Üí    if (efficiency < 80) score -= 10;
  1058‚Üí    
  1059‚Üí    // Reward fast execution
  1060‚Üí    if (totalSeconds < 300 && execution.errors.length === 0) score += 10; // < 5 minutes
  1061‚Üí    
  1062‚Üí    const result = {
  1063‚Üí      overallScore: Math.max(0, Math.min(100, score)),
  1064‚Üí      bottlenecks,
  1065‚Üí      efficiency: Math.round(efficiency),
  1066‚Üí      recommendations
  1067‚Üí    };
  1068‚Üí    
  1069‚Üí    log('Workflow performance analysis', 'info', {
  1070‚Üí      totalDuration: `${totalSeconds.toFixed(1)}s`,
  1071‚Üí      efficiency: `${result.efficiency}%`,
  1072‚Üí      bottlenecks: result.bottlenecks.length,
  1073‚Üí      score: result.overallScore
  1074‚Üí    });
  1075‚Üí    
  1076‚Üí    return result;
  1077‚Üí  }
  1078‚Üí
  1079‚Üí  private startBackgroundMonitor(): void {
  1080‚Üí    setInterval(() => {
  1081‚Üí      this.monitorExecutions();
  1082‚Üí    }, 30000);
  1083‚Üí  }
  1084‚Üí
  1085‚Üí  private monitorExecutions(): void {
  1086‚Üí    const now = new Date();
  1087‚Üí    
  1088‚Üí    for (const [id, execution] of this.executions.entries()) {
  1089‚Üí      if (execution.status === "running") {
  1090‚Üí        const duration = now.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime();
  1091‚Üí        const workflow = this.workflows.get(execution.workflow);
  1092‚Üí        const maxDuration = (workflow?.config.timeout || 600) * 1000;
  1093‚Üí        
  1094‚Üí        if (duration > maxDuration) {
  1095‚Üí          execution.status = "failed";
  1096‚Üí          execution.endTime = now;
  1097‚Üí          execution.errors.push(`Workflow timeout exceeded: ${duration}ms > ${maxDuration}ms`);
  1098‚Üí          
  1099‚Üí          log(`Workflow timed out: ${id}`, "warning", {
  1100‚Üí            duration,
  1101‚Üí            maxDuration,
  1102‚Üí            workflow: execution.workflow,
  1103‚Üí          });
  1104‚Üí        }
  1105‚Üí      }
  1106‚Üí    }
  1107‚Üí
  1108‚Üí    // Cleanup old executions (keep last 100)
  1109‚Üí    const executionEntries = Array.from(this.executions.entries());
  1110‚Üí    if (executionEntries.length > 100) {
  1111‚Üí      const sortedExecutions = executionEntries.sort((a, b) => 
  1112‚Üí        (b[1].endTime || b[1].startTime).getTime() - (a[1].endTime || a[1].startTime).getTime()
  1113‚Üí      );
  1114‚Üí      
  1115‚Üí      const toKeep = sortedExecutions.slice(0, 100);
  1116‚Üí      this.executions.clear();
  1117‚Üí      toKeep.forEach(([id, execution]) => this.executions.set(id, execution));
  1118‚Üí    }
  1119‚Üí  }
  1120‚Üí
  1121‚Üí  getWorkflows(): WorkflowDefinition[] {
  1122‚Üí    return Array.from(this.workflows.values());
  1123‚Üí  }
  1124‚Üí
  1125‚Üí  getExecution(executionId: string): WorkflowExecution | undefined {
  1126‚Üí    return this.executions.get(executionId);
  1127‚Üí  }
  1128‚Üí
  1129‚Üí  getActiveExecutions(): WorkflowExecution[] {
  1130‚Üí    return Array.from(this.executions.values()).filter(
  1131‚Üí      exec => exec.status === "running" || exec.status === "pending"
  1132‚Üí    );
  1133‚Üí  }
  1134‚Üí
  1135‚Üí  getExecutionHistory(limit: number = 20): WorkflowExecution[] {
  1136‚Üí    const executions = Array.from(this.executions.values())
  1137‚Üí      .sort((a, b) => (b.endTime || b.startTime).getTime() - (a.endTime || a.startTime).getTime());
  1138‚Üí    
  1139‚Üí    return executions.slice(0, limit);
  1140‚Üí  }
  1141‚Üí
  1142‚Üí  shutdown(): void {
  1143‚Üí    this.running = false;
  1144‚Üí    log("CoordinatorAgent shutting down", "info");
  1145‚Üí  }
  1146‚Üí
  1147‚Üí  healthCheck(): Record<string, any> {
  1148‚Üí    const activeExecutions = this.getActiveExecutions();
  1149‚Üí    
  1150‚Üí    return {
  1151‚Üí      status: "healthy",
  1152‚Üí      workflows_available: this.workflows.size,
  1153‚Üí      active_executions: activeExecutions.length,
  1154‚Üí      total_executions: this.executions.size,
  1155‚Üí      registered_agents: this.agents.size,
  1156‚Üí      uptime: Date.now(),
  1157‚Üí    };
  1158‚Üí  }
  1159‚Üí}
