   897‚Üí  /**
   898‚Üí   * Generate detailed analysis of what each step did and decided
   899‚Üí   */
   900‚Üí  private generateDetailedStepAnalysis(execution: WorkflowExecution): string {
   901‚Üí    const analysis: string[] = [];
   902‚Üí    
   903‚Üí    for (const [stepName, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
   904‚Üí      if (result.error) {
   905‚Üí        analysis.push(`### ${stepName} - ‚ùå FAILED\n**Error:** ${result.error}`);
   906‚Üí        continue;
   907‚Üí      }
   908‚Üí      
   909‚Üí      let stepDetails = `### ${stepName} - ‚úÖ SUCCESS\n`;
   910‚Üí      
   911‚Üí      // Add specific analysis based on step type
   912‚Üí      switch (stepName) {
   913‚Üí        case 'persist_results':
   914‚Üí          if (result.entitiesCreated || result.filesCreated) {
   915‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Entities Created:** ${result.entitiesCreated || 0}\n`;
   916‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Files Created:** ${result.filesCreated?.length || 0}\n`;
   917‚Üí            if (result.filesCreated?.length > 0) {
   918‚Üí              stepDetails += `**Files:** ${result.filesCreated.join(', ')}\n`;
   919‚Üí            }
   920‚Üí          }
   921‚Üí          break;
   922‚Üí          
   923‚Üí        case 'deduplicate_insights':
   924‚Üí          if (result.duplicatesFound !== undefined) {
   925‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Duplicates Found:** ${result.duplicatesFound}\n`;
   926‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Entities Merged:** ${result.entitiesMerged || 0}\n`;
   927‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Processing Time:** ${result.processingTime || 'Unknown'}\n`;
   928‚Üí          }
   929‚Üí          break;
   930‚Üí          
   931‚Üí        case 'quality_assurance':
   932‚Üí          if (result.validations) {
   933‚Üí            const passed = Object.values(result.validations).filter((v: any) => v.passed).length;
   934‚Üí            const total = Object.keys(result.validations).length;
   935‚Üí            stepDetails += `**QA Validations:** ${passed}/${total} passed\n`;
   936‚Üí            if (result.overallScore) {
   937‚Üí              stepDetails += `**Overall Score:** ${result.overallScore}/100\n`;
   938‚Üí            }
   939‚Üí          }
   940‚Üí          break;
   941‚Üí          
   942‚Üí        case 'generate_insights':
   943‚Üí          if (result.insights_generated) {
   944‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Insights Generated:** ${result.insights_generated}\n`;
   945‚Üí          }
   946‚Üí          if (result.filename) {
   947‚Üí            stepDetails += `**Generated File:** ${result.filename}\n`;
   948‚Üí          }
   949‚Üí          break;
   950‚Üí      }
   951‚Üí      
   952‚Üí      // Add timing information
   953‚Üí      if (result._timing) {
   954‚Üí        const duration = (result._timing.duration / 1000).toFixed(1);
   955‚Üí        const utilization = ((result._timing.duration / 1000) / result._timing.timeout * 100).toFixed(1);
   956‚Üí        stepDetails += `**Timing:** ${duration}s (${utilization}% of ${result._timing.timeout}s timeout)\n`;
   957‚Üí      }
   958‚Üí      
   959‚Üí      analysis.push(stepDetails);
   960‚Üí    }
   961‚Üí    
   962‚Üí    return analysis.join('\n');
   963‚Üí  }

   965‚Üí  private generateWorkflowSummary(execution: WorkflowExecution, workflow: WorkflowDefinition): string {

   985‚Üí

   988‚Üí

  1009‚Üí  private analyzeWorkflowPerformance(execution: WorkflowExecution): {
  1010‚Üí    overallScore: number;
  1011‚Üí    bottlenecks: string[];
  1012‚Üí    efficiency: number;
  1013‚Üí    recommendations: string[];
  1014‚Üí  } {
  1015‚Üí    const bottlenecks: string[] = [];
  1016‚Üí    const recommendations: string[] = [];
  1017‚Üí    
  1018‚Üí    const totalDuration = execution.endTime!.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime();
  1019‚Üí    const totalSeconds = totalDuration / 1000;
  1020‚Üí    
  1021‚Üí    // Analyze step performance
  1022‚Üí    const stepTimings: Array<{ name: string; duration: number; timeout: number }> = [];
  1023‚Üí    
  1024‚Üí    for (const [stepName, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
  1025‚Üí      if (result?._timing) {
  1026‚Üí        const duration = result._timing.duration / 1000;
  1027‚Üí        const timeout = result._timing.timeout;
  1028‚Üí        stepTimings.push({ name: stepName, duration, timeout });
  1029‚Üí        
  1030‚Üí        // Identify bottlenecks
  1031‚Üí        if (duration > timeout * 0.8) {
  1032‚Üí          bottlenecks.push(`${stepName} (${duration.toFixed(1)}s/${timeout}s)`);
  1033‚Üí        }
  1034‚Üí        
  1035‚Üí        // Performance-based recommendations
  1036‚Üí        if (duration > 180) { // > 3 minutes
  1037‚Üí          recommendations.push(`Optimize ${stepName} - took ${duration.toFixed(1)}s`);
  1038‚Üí        }
  1039‚Üí      }
  1040‚Üí    }
  1041‚Üí    
  1042‚Üí    // Calculate efficiency score
  1043‚Üí    const totalStepTime = stepTimings.reduce((sum, step) => sum + step.duration, 0);
  1044‚Üí    const efficiency = totalStepTime > 0 ? (totalSeconds / totalStepTime) * 100 : 100;
  1045‚Üí    
  1046‚Üí    // Overall performance score
  1047‚Üí    let score = 100;
  1048‚Üí    
  1049‚Üí    // Penalize long workflows
  1050‚Üí    if (totalSeconds > 900) score -= 30; // > 15 minutes
  1051‚Üí    else if (totalSeconds > 600) score -= 15; // > 10 minutes
  1052‚Üí    
  1053‚Üí    // Penalize bottlenecks
  1054‚Üí    score -= bottlenecks.length * 10;
  1055‚Üí    
  1056‚Üí    // Penalize low efficiency (too much parallel overhead)
  1057‚Üí    if (efficiency < 80) score -= 10;
  1058‚Üí    
  1059‚Üí    // Reward fast execution
  1060‚Üí    if (totalSeconds < 300 && execution.errors.length === 0) score += 10; // < 5 minutes
  1061‚Üí    
  1062‚Üí    const result = {
  1063‚Üí      overallScore: Math.max(0, Math.min(100, score)),
  1064‚Üí      bottlenecks,
  1065‚Üí      efficiency: Math.round(efficiency),
  1066‚Üí      recommendations
  1067‚Üí    };
  1068‚Üí    
  1069‚Üí    log('Workflow performance analysis', 'info', {
  1070‚Üí      totalDuration: `${totalSeconds.toFixed(1)}s`,
  1071‚Üí      efficiency: `${result.efficiency}%`,
  1072‚Üí      bottlenecks: result.bottlenecks.length,
  1073‚Üí      score: result.overallScore
  1074‚Üí    });
  1075‚Üí    
  1076‚Üí    return result;
  1077‚Üí  }
  1078‚Üí
  1079‚Üí  private startBackgroundMonitor(): void {
  1080‚Üí    setInterval(() => {
  1081‚Üí      this.monitorExecutions();
  1082‚Üí    }, 30000);
  1083‚Üí  }
  1084‚Üí
  1085‚Üí  private monitorExecutions(): void {
  1086‚Üí    const now = new Date();
  1087‚Üí    
  1088‚Üí    for (const [id, execution] of this.executions.entries()) {
  1089‚Üí      if (execution.status === "running") {
  1090‚Üí        const duration = now.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime();
  1091‚Üí        const workflow = this.workflows.get(execution.workflow);
  1092‚Üí        const maxDuration = (workflow?.config.timeout || 600) * 1000;
  1093‚Üí        
  1094‚Üí        if (duration > maxDuration) {
  1095‚Üí          execution.status = "failed";
  1096‚Üí          execution.endTime = now;
  1097‚Üí          execution.errors.push(`Workflow timeout exceeded: ${duration}ms > ${maxDuration}ms`);
  1098‚Üí          
  1099‚Üí          log(`Workflow timed out: ${id}`, "warning", {
  1100‚Üí            duration,
  1101‚Üí            maxDuration,
  1102‚Üí            workflow: execution.workflow,
  1103‚Üí          });
  1104‚Üí        }
  1105‚Üí      }
  1106‚Üí    }
  1107‚Üí
  1108‚Üí    // Cleanup old executions (keep last 100)
  1109‚Üí    const executionEntries = Array.from(this.executions.entries());
  1110‚Üí    if (executionEntries.length > 100) {
  1111‚Üí      const sortedExecutions = executionEntries.sort((a, b) => 
  1112‚Üí        (b[1].endTime || b[1].startTime).getTime() - (a[1].endTime || a[1].startTime).getTime()
  1113‚Üí      );
  1114‚Üí      
  1115‚Üí      const toKeep = sortedExecutions.slice(0, 100);
  1116‚Üí      this.executions.clear();
  1117‚Üí      toKeep.forEach(([id, execution]) => this.executions.set(id, execution));
  1118‚Üí    }
  1119‚Üí  }
  1120‚Üí
  1121‚Üí  getWorkflows(): WorkflowDefinition[] {
  1122‚Üí    return Array.from(this.workflows.values());
  1123‚Üí  }
  1124‚Üí
  1125‚Üí  getExecution(executionId: string): WorkflowExecution | undefined {
  1126‚Üí    return this.executions.get(executionId);
  1127‚Üí  }
  1128‚Üí
  1129‚Üí  getActiveExecutions(): WorkflowExecution[] {
  1130‚Üí    return Array.from(this.executions.values()).filter(
  1131‚Üí      exec => exec.status === "running" || exec.status === "pending"
  1132‚Üí    );
  1133‚Üí  }
  1134‚Üí
  1135‚Üí  getExecutionHistory(limit: number = 20): WorkflowExecution[] {
  1136‚Üí    const executions = Array.from(this.executions.values())
  1137‚Üí      .sort((a, b) => (b.endTime || b.startTime).getTime() - (a.endTime || a.startTime).getTime());
  1138‚Üí    
  1139‚Üí    return executions.slice(0, limit);
  1140‚Üí  }
  1141‚Üí
  1142‚Üí  shutdown(): void {
  1143‚Üí    this.running = false;
  1144‚Üí    log("CoordinatorAgent shutting down", "info");
  1145‚Üí  }
  1146‚Üí
  1147‚Üí  healthCheck(): Record<string, any> {
  1148‚Üí    const activeExecutions = this.getActiveExecutions();
  1149‚Üí    
  1150‚Üí    return {
  1151‚Üí      status: "healthy",
  1152‚Üí      workflows_available: this.workflows.size,
  1153‚Üí      active_executions: activeExecutions.length,
  1154‚Üí      total_executions: this.executions.size,
  1155‚Üí      registered_agents: this.agents.size,
  1156‚Üí      uptime: Date.now(),
  1157‚Üí    };
  1158‚Üí  }
  1159‚Üí}

   270‚Üí// Tool call handler
   271‚Üíexport async function handleToolCall(name: string, args: any): Promise<any> {
   272‚Üí  log(`Handling tool call: ${name}`, "info", args);
   273‚Üí
   274‚Üí  try {
   275‚Üí    switch (name) {
   276‚Üí      case "heartbeat":
   277‚Üí        return handleHeartbeat();
   278‚Üí        
   279‚Üí      case "test_connection":
   280‚Üí        return handleTestConnection();
   281‚Üí        
   282‚Üí      case "determine_insights":
   283‚Üí        return await handleDetermineInsights(args);
   284‚Üí        
   285‚Üí      case "analyze_code":
   286‚Üí        return await handleAnalyzeCode(args);
   287‚Üí        
   288‚Üí      case "analyze_repository":
   289‚Üí        return await handleAnalyzeRepository(args);
   290‚Üí        
   291‚Üí      case "extract_patterns":
   292‚Üí        return await handleExtractPatterns(args);
   293‚Üí        
   294‚Üí      case "create_ukb_entity_with_insight":
   295‚Üí        return await handleCreateUkbEntity(args);
   296‚Üí        
   297‚Üí      case "execute_workflow":
   298‚Üí        return await handleExecuteWorkflow(args);
   299‚Üí        
   300‚Üí      case "generate_documentation":
   301‚Üí        return await handleGenerateDocumentation(args);
   302‚Üí        
   303‚Üí      case "create_insight_report":
   304‚Üí        return await handleCreateInsightReport(args);
   305‚Üí        
   306‚Üí      case "generate_plantuml_diagrams":
   307‚Üí        return await handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams(args);
   308‚Üí        
   309‚Üí        
   310‚Üí      default:
   311‚Üí        throw new Error(`Unknown tool: ${name}`);
   312‚Üí    }
   313‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   314‚Üí    log(`Error in tool ${name}:`, "error", error);
   315‚Üí    return {
   316‚Üí      content: [
   317‚Üí        {
   318‚Üí          type: "text",
   319‚Üí          text: `Error: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}`,
   320‚Üí        },
   321‚Üí      ],
   322‚Üí      isError: true,
   323‚Üí    };
   324‚Üí  }
   325‚Üí}

   361‚Üíasync function handleDetermineInsights(args: any): Promise<any> {
   362‚Üí  const { content, context, analysis_type = "general", provider = "auto" } = args;
   363‚Üí  
   364‚Üí  log(`Determining insights for content (${content.length} chars)`, "info", {
   365‚Üí    analysis_type,
   366‚Üí    provider,
   367‚Üí    has_context: !!context,
   368‚Üí  });
   369‚Üí  
   370‚Üí  try {
   371‚Üí    const analyzer = new SemanticAnalyzer();
   372‚Üí    log("SemanticAnalyzer created", "info");
   373‚Üí    
   374‚Üí    const result = await analyzer.analyzeContent(content, {
   375‚Üí      context,
   376‚Üí      analysisType: analysis_type,
   377‚Üí      provider
   378‚Üí    });
   379‚Üí    
   380‚Üí    log("SemanticAnalyzer.analyzeContent completed", "info", {
   381‚Üí      hasResult: !!result,
   382‚Üí      resultType: typeof result,
   383‚Üí      resultKeys: result ? Object.keys(result) : null,
   384‚Üí      insightsLength: result?.insights?.length || 0,
   385‚Üí      provider: result?.provider || "none"
   386‚Üí    });
   387‚Üí
   388‚Üí    if (!result) {
   389‚Üí      throw new Error("SemanticAnalyzer returned null/undefined result");
   390‚Üí    }
   391‚Üí
   392‚Üí    return {
   393‚Üí      content: [
   394‚Üí        {
   395‚Üí          type: "text", 
   396‚Üí          text: `# Semantic Analysis Insights\n\n${result.insights || 'No insights generated'}\n\n## Metadata\n- Provider: ${result.provider || 'Unknown'}\n- Analysis Type: ${analysis_type}\n- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}`,
   397‚Üí        },
   398‚Üí      ],
   399‚Üí    };
   400‚Üí  } catch (error: any) {
   401‚Üí    log("Error in handleDetermineInsights", "error", {
   402‚Üí      error: error.message,
   403‚Üí      stack: error.stack
   404‚Üí    });
   405‚Üí    
   406‚Üí    return {
   407‚Üí      content: [
   408‚Üí        {
   409‚Üí          type: "text",
   410‚Üí          text: `# Semantic Analysis Error\n\nError: ${error.message}\n\n## Details\n- Analysis Type: ${analysis_type}\n- Provider: ${provider}\n- Content Length: ${content.length}\n- Has Context: ${!!context}\n- Timestamp: ${new Date().toISOString()}`,
   411‚Üí        },
   412‚Üí      ],
   413‚Üí    };
   414‚Üí  }
   415‚Üí}

   515‚Üí  const { workflow_name, parameters } = args;
   516‚Üí  
   517‚Üí  log(`Executing workflow: ${workflow_name}`, "info", { parameters });
   518‚Üí  
   519‚Üí  try {
   520‚Üí    // Initialize coordinator and execute real workflow
   521‚Üí    // Use repository_path from parameters or default to current directory
   522‚Üí    let repositoryPath = parameters?.repository_path || '.';
   523‚Üí    
   524‚Üí    // If we're running from the semantic analysis subdirectory, resolve the main repo path
   525‚Üí    if (repositoryPath === '.' && process.cwd().includes('mcp-server-semantic-analysis')) {
   526‚Üí      // Go up two levels from integrations/mcp-server-semantic-analysis to the main repo
   527‚Üí      repositoryPath = path.join(process.cwd(), '../..');
   528‚Üí    } else if (repositoryPath && !path.isAbsolute(repositoryPath)) {
   529‚Üí      // Make relative paths absolute
   530‚Üí      repositoryPath = path.resolve(repositoryPath);
   531‚Üí    }
   532‚Üí    
   533‚Üí    log(`Using repository path: ${repositoryPath}`, "info");
   534‚Üí    const coordinator = new CoordinatorAgent(repositoryPath);
   535‚Üí    const execution = await coordinator.executeWorkflow(workflow_name, parameters);
   536‚Üí    
   537‚Üí    // Format execution results
   538‚Üí    const statusEmoji = execution.status === "completed" ? "‚úÖ" : execution.status === "failed" ? "‚ùå" : "‚ö°";
   539‚Üí    const duration = execution.endTime ? 
   540‚Üí      `${Math.round((execution.endTime.getTime() - execution.startTime.getTime()) / 1000)}s` : 
   541‚Üí      "ongoing";
   542‚Üí    
   543‚Üí    let resultText = `# Workflow Execution\n\n**Workflow:** ${workflow_name}\n**Status:** ${statusEmoji} ${execution.status}\n**Duration:** ${duration}\n**Steps:** ${execution.currentStep}/${execution.totalSteps}\n\n## Parameters\n${JSON.stringify(parameters || {}, null, 2)}\n\n`;
   544‚Üí    
   545‚Üí    // Add step results
   546‚Üí    if (Object.keys(execution.results).length > 0) {
   547‚Üí      resultText += "## Results\n";
   548‚Üí      for (const [step, result] of Object.entries(execution.results)) {
   549‚Üí        resultText += `- **${step}**: ${typeof result === 'object' ? 'Completed' : result}\n`;
   550‚Üí      }
   551‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   552‚Üí    }
   553‚Üí    
   554‚Üí    // Add QA reports if available
   555‚Üí    const qaResults = execution.results.quality_assurance;
   556‚Üí    if (qaResults && qaResults.validations) {
   557‚Üí      resultText += "## <USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance\n";
   558‚Üí      for (const [stepName, qa] of Object.entries(qaResults.validations)) {
   559‚Üí        const qaReport = qa as any; // Type assertion for validation result
   560‚Üí        const <USER_ID_REDACTED> = qaReport.passed ? "‚úÖ" : "‚ùå";
   561‚Üí        resultText += `- **${stepName}**: ${<USER_ID_REDACTED>} ${qaReport.passed ? 'Passed' : 'Failed'}\n`;
   562‚Üí        if (qaReport.errors && qaReport.errors.length > 0) {
   563‚Üí          resultText += `  - Errors: ${qaReport.errors.join(', ')}\n`;
   564‚Üí        }
   565‚Üí        if (qaReport.warnings && qaReport.warnings.length > 0) {
   566‚Üí          resultText += `  - Warnings: ${qaReport.warnings.join(', ')}\n`;
   567‚Üí        }
   568‚Üí      }
   569‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   570‚Üí    }
   571‚Üí    
   572‚Üí    // Add errors if any
   573‚Üí    if (execution.errors.length > 0) {
   574‚Üí      resultText += "## Errors\n";
   575‚Üí      for (const error of execution.errors) {
   576‚Üí        resultText += `- ${error}\n`;
   577‚Üí      }
   578‚Üí      resultText += "\n";
   579‚Üí    }
   580‚Üí    
   581‚Üí    // Add artifacts information
   582‚Üí    if (execution.status === "completed") {
   583‚Üí      resultText += "## Generated Artifacts\n";
   584‚Üí      resultText += "Check the following locations for generated files:\n";
   585‚Üí      resultText += "- `knowledge-management/insights/` - Insight documents\n";
   586‚Üí      resultText += "- `shared-memory-coding.json` - Updated knowledge base\n";
   587‚Üí      resultText += "- Generated PlantUML diagrams and documentation\n";
   588‚Üí    }
   589‚Üí    
   590‚Üí    return {
   591‚Üí      content: [
   592‚Üí        {
   593‚Üí          type: "text",
   594‚Üí          text: resultText,
   595‚Üí        },
   596‚Üí      ],
   597‚Üí    };
   598‚Üí    
   599‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   600‚Üí    log(`Workflow execution failed: ${workflow_name}`, "error", error);
   601‚Üí    return {
   602‚Üí      content: [
   603‚Üí        {
   604‚Üí          type: "text",
   605‚Üí          text: `# Workflow Execution Failed\n\n**Workflow:** ${workflow_name}\n**Error:** ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\n## Parameters\n${JSON.stringify(parameters || {}, null, 2)}`,
   606‚Üí        },
   607‚Üí      ],
   608‚Üí    };
   609‚Üí  }
   610‚Üí}

   612‚Üí// Helper functions for formatting documentation sections
   613‚Üífunction formatDetailedFindings(analysis: any): string {
   614‚Üí  if (!analysis) return "No detailed findings available.";
   615‚Üí  
   616‚Üí  const findings = [];
   617‚Üí  
   618‚Üí  // Add repository structure findings
   619‚Üí  if (analysis.structure) {
   620‚Üí    findings.push("### Repository Structure");
   621‚Üí    findings.push(analysis.structure);
   622‚Üí  }
   623‚Üí  
   624‚Üí  // Add key patterns
   625‚Üí  if (analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns) {
   626‚Üí    findings.push("\n### Key Patterns Identified");
   627‚Üí    const patterns = analysis.patterns || analysis.key_patterns;
   628‚Üí    if (Array.isArray(patterns)) {
   629‚Üí      patterns.forEach((pattern: string) => findings.push(`- ${pattern}`));
   630‚Üí    } else {
   631‚Üí      findings.push(patterns);
   632‚Üí    }
   633‚Üí  }
   634‚Üí  
   635‚Üí  // Add insights
   636‚Üí  if (analysis.insights) {
   637‚Üí    findings.push("\n### Architectural Insights");
   638‚Üí    findings.push(analysis.insights);
   639‚Üí  }
   640‚Üí  
   641‚Üí  return findings.join("\n") || "Analysis completed successfully.";
   642‚Üí}
   643‚Üí
   644‚Üífunction formatQualityMetrics(analysis: any): string {
   645‚Üí  const metrics = [];
   646‚Üí  
   647‚Üí  if (analysis.complexity || analysis.complexity_score) {
   648‚Üí    metrics.push(`- **Complexity Score**: ${analysis.complexity || analysis.complexity_score}/10`);
   649‚Üí  }
   650‚Üí  
   651‚Üí  if (analysis.files_analyzed) {

   653‚Üí  }

   655‚Üí  if (analysis.patterns?.length) {

   660‚Üí  metrics.push(`- **Maturity Level**: ${analysis.maturity || "Not assessed"}`);
   661‚Üí  
   662‚Üí  return metrics.join("\n") || "<USER_ID_REDACTED> metrics pending assessment.";
   663‚Üí}
   664‚Üí
   665‚Üífunction formatArchitectureInsights(analysis: any): string {
   666‚Üí  if (analysis.architecture_insights) {

   668‚Üí  }
   669‚Üí

   680‚Üí    });
   681‚Üí  }
   682‚Üí  
   683‚Üí  return insights.join("\n") || "Architecture analysis pending.";

   685‚Üí
   686‚Üífunction formatPatternAnalysis(analysis: any): string {

   702‚Üí  return patterns.join("\n") || "Pattern analysis in progress.";

   705‚Üífunction formatRecommendations(analysis: any): string {
   706‚Üí  if (analysis.recommendations) {

   708‚Üí      ? analysis.recommendations.map((r: any) => `- ${r}`).join("\n")
   709‚Üí      : analysis.recommendations;

   711‚Üí  
   712‚Üí  const recommendations = [

   718‚Üí

   740‚Üíasync function handleGenerateDocumentation(args: any): Promise<any> {
   741‚Üí  const { analysis_result, metadata } = args;
   742‚Üí  
   743‚Üí  log("Generating documentation with real file writing", "info", { has_metadata: !!metadata });
   744‚Üí  
   745‚Üí  try {
   746‚Üí    const docAgent = new InsightGenerationAgent();
   747‚Üí    
   748‚Üí    // Map the analysis result to the expected template variables
   749‚Üí    const documentationData = {
   750‚Üí      analysis_title: metadata?.title || analysis_result?.title || "Semantic Analysis Report",
   751‚Üí      scope: analysis_result?.scope || analysis_result?.repository_path || "Repository analysis",
   752‚Üí      duration: analysis_result?.duration || "Not measured",
   753‚Üí      analyzed_items: analysis_result?.analyzed_items || 
   754‚Üí                      `${analysis_result?.files_analyzed || 0} files analyzed`,
   755‚Üí      methodology: analysis_result?.methodology || 
   756‚Üí                   "Comprehensive semantic analysis using 8-agent architecture with AI-powered insights",
   757‚Üí      results_summary: analysis_result?.summary || analysis_result?.results_summary || 
   758‚Üí                       "Analysis completed successfully with insights extracted",
   759‚Üí      detailed_findings: formatDetailedFindings(analysis_result),
   760‚Üí      quality_metrics: formatQualityMetrics(analysis_result),
   761‚Üí      architecture_insights: formatArchitectureInsights(analysis_result),
   762‚Üí      pattern_analysis: formatPatternAnalysis(analysis_result),
   763‚Üí      recommendations: formatRecommendations(analysis_result),
   764‚Üí      appendices: formatAppendices(analysis_result),
   765‚Üí      timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
   766‚Üí    };
   767‚Üí    
   768‚Üí    // Generate the documentation content
   769‚Üí    const docResult = await docAgent.generateDocumentation("analysis_documentation", documentationData);
   770‚Üí    
   771‚Üí    // Save the documentation to files
   772‚Üí    const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
   773‚Üí    const insightsDir = process.env.KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH;

   775‚Üí      throw new Error('KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH environment variable not set');
   776‚Üí    }
   777‚Üí    const outputPath = `${insightsDir}/${today}-semantic-analysis.md`;

   779‚Üí    await docAgent.saveDocumentation(docResult, outputPath);
   780‚Üí    
   781‚Üí    log(`Documentation saved to file: ${outputPath}`, "info", {
   782‚Üí      title: docResult.title,
   783‚Üí      contentLength: docResult.content.length
   784‚Üí    });
   785‚Üí    
   786‚Üí    return {
   787‚Üí      content: [
   788‚Üí        {
   789‚Üí          type: "text",
   790‚Üí          text: `# Generated Documentation\n\n**File Created:** ${outputPath}\n**Title:** ${docResult.title}\n**Size:** ${docResult.content.length} chars\n**Generated:** ${docResult.generatedAt}\n\n## Preview\n\n${docResult.content.substring(0, 500)}${docResult.content.length > 500 ? '...' : ''}`,
   791‚Üí        },
   792‚Üí      ],
   793‚Üí      metadata: {
   794‚Üí        filePath: outputPath,
   795‚Üí        fileSize: docResult.content.length,
   796‚Üí        title: docResult.title
   797‚Üí      }
   798‚Üí    };
   799‚Üí    
   800‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   801‚Üí    log("Failed to generate documentation", "error", error);
   802‚Üí    return {
   803‚Üí      content: [
   804‚Üí        {
   805‚Üí          type: "text",
   806‚Üí          text: `# Documentation Generation Failed\n\nError: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\nFalling back to basic documentation...`,
   807‚Üí        },
   808‚Üí      ],
   809‚Üí    };
   810‚Üí  }
   811‚Üí}

   831‚Üíasync function handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams(args: any): Promise<any> {
   832‚Üí  const { diagram_type, content, name, analysis_result } = args;
   833‚Üí  
   834‚Üí  // üîç TRACE: Log what arguments we received
   835‚Üí  log(`üîç DEBUG: handleGeneratePlantUMLDiagrams called with:`, "debug", {
   836‚Üí    diagram_type,
   837‚Üí    content,
   838‚Üí    name,
   839‚Üí    hasAnalysisResult: !!analysis_result,
   840‚Üí    analysisResultType: typeof analysis_result,
   841‚Üí    analysisResultKeys: analysis_result ? Object.keys(analysis_result) : [],
   842‚Üí    argsKeys: Object.keys(args)
   843‚Üí  });
   844‚Üí  
   845‚Üí  log(`Generating PlantUML diagram: ${name}`, "info", { diagram_type });
   846‚Üí  
   847‚Üí  // Use LLM-enhanced diagram generation instead of static templates
   848‚Üí  const insightAgent = new InsightGenerationAgent();
   849‚Üí  let diagramContent = '';
   850‚Üí  
   851‚Üí  try {
   852‚Üí    // Try LLM-enhanced generation first
   853‚Üí    log(`Attempting LLM-enhanced ${diagram_type} diagram generation`, "info");
   854‚Üí    
   855‚Üí    const dataForLLM = { 
   856‚Üí      patternCatalog: analysis_result,
   857‚Üí      content,
   858‚Üí      name 
   859‚Üí    };
   860‚Üí    
   861‚Üí    log(`üîç DEBUG: Data being passed to LLM:`, "debug", {
   862‚Üí      hasPatternCatalog: !!dataForLLM.patternCatalog,
   863‚Üí      patternCatalogType: typeof dataForLLM.patternCatalog,
   864‚Üí      content: dataForLLM.content,
   865‚Üí      name: dataForLLM.name
   866‚Üí    });
   867‚Üí    
   868‚Üí    diagramContent = await insightAgent.generateLLMEnhancedDiagram(diagram_type, dataForLLM);
   869‚Üí    
   870‚Üí    if (diagramContent && diagramContent.includes('@startuml')) {
   871‚Üí      log(`LLM-enhanced diagram generated successfully`, "info", { length: diagramContent.length });
   872‚Üí    } else {
   873‚Üí      log(`LLM-enhanced diagram generation failed, content: ${diagramContent}`, "warning");
   874‚Üí      throw new Error('LLM diagram generation failed - no valid PlantUML content');
   875‚Üí    }
   876‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   877‚Üí    log(`LLM diagram generation failed: ${error}`, "error");
   878‚Üí    return {
   879‚Üí      content: [
   880‚Üí        {
   881‚Üí          type: "text",
   882‚Üí          text: `‚ùå LLM-Enhanced PlantUML Generation Failed\n\n**Error:** ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)}\n\n**Diagram Type:** ${diagram_type}\n**Name:** ${name}\n\n**Root Cause:** The LLM provider could not generate repository-specific diagram content. This indicates either:\n1. Missing analysis data in the input\n2. LLM provider configuration issues\n3. Insufficient semantic analysis results\n\n**Solution:** Please check the semantic analysis results and ensure they contain meaningful patterns and components before attempting diagram generation.`
   883‚Üí        }
   884‚Üí      ],
   885‚Üí      isError: true,
   886‚Üí    };
   887‚Üí  }
   888‚Üí  
   889‚Üí  try {
   890‚Üí    // Set up directory structure
   891‚Üí    const insightsDir = process.env.KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH;
   892‚Üí    if (!insightsDir) {
   893‚Üí      throw new Error('KNOWLEDGE_BASE_PATH environment variable not set');
   894‚Üí    }
   895‚Üí    const pumlDir = path.join(insightsDir, 'puml');
   896‚Üí    const imagesDir = path.join(insightsDir, 'images');
   897‚Üí    
   898‚Üí    // Ensure directories exist
   899‚Üí    mkdirSync(pumlDir, { recursive: true });
   900‚Üí    mkdirSync(imagesDir, { recursive: true });
   901‚Üí    
   902‚Üí    // Generate lowercase filename for consistency
   903‚Üí    const fileBaseName = name.toLowerCase();
   904‚Üí    const pumlFile = path.join(pumlDir, `${fileBaseName}-${diagram_type}.puml`);
   905‚Üí    
   906‚Üí    // Write the PlantUML file
   907‚Üí    writeFileSync(pumlFile, diagramContent);
   908‚Üí    
   909‚Üí    log(`PlantUML file created: ${pumlFile}`, "info", {
   910‚Üí      name,
   911‚Üí      diagram_type,
   912‚Üí      fileSize: diagramContent.length
   913‚Üí    });
   914‚Üí    
   915‚Üí    // Generate PNG image using plantuml command
   916‚Üí    const pngFile = path.join(imagesDir, `${fileBaseName}-${diagram_type}.png`);
   917‚Üí    let pngGenerated = false;
   918‚Üí    
   919‚Üí    try {
   920‚Üí      const { exec } = await import('child_process');
   921‚Üí      const { promisify } = await import('util');
   922‚Üí      const execAsync = promisify(exec);
   923‚Üí      
   924‚Üí      // Use relative path to avoid nested directory creation
   925‚Üí      const relativePath = path.relative(path.dirname(pumlFile), imagesDir);
   926‚Üí      await execAsync(`plantuml -tpng "${pumlFile}" -o "${relativePath}"`);
   927‚Üí      pngGenerated = true;
   928‚Üí      
   929‚Üí      log(`PNG file generated: ${pngFile}`, "info", {
   930‚Üí        pumlFile,
   931‚Üí        pngFile
   932‚Üí      });
   933‚Üí      
   934‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   935‚Üí      log(`Failed to generate PNG: ${error}`, "warning", {
   936‚Üí        pumlFile,
   937‚Üí        error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)
   938‚Üí      });
   939‚Üí    }
   940‚Üí    
   941‚Üí    return {
   942‚Üí      content: [
   943‚Üí        {

   977‚Üífunction generateArchitectureDiagram(title: string, analysis: any): string {
   978‚Üí  // Extract meaningful components from analysis data
   979‚Üí  let components = [];
   980‚Üí  
   981‚Üí  // Debug: log what we received
   982‚Üí  console.log(`üé® PlantUML generateArchitectureDiagram called:`, {
   983‚Üí    title,
   984‚Üí    hasAnalysis: !!analysis, 
   985‚Üí    hasSemanticInsights: !!analysis?.semanticInsights,
   986‚Üí    hasPatterns: !!analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns,
   987‚Üí    hasCommits: !!analysis?.commits,
   988‚Üí    hasArchDecisions: !!analysis?.architecturalDecisions,
   989‚Üí    analysisKeys: analysis ? Object.keys(analysis) : []
   990‚Üí  });
   991‚Üí  
   992‚Üí  log(`generateArchitectureDiagram called with analysis:`, 'debug', { 
   993‚Üí    hasAnalysis: !!analysis, 
   994‚Üí    hasSemanticInsights: !!analysis?.semanticInsights,
   995‚Üí    hasPatterns: !!analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns,
   996‚Üí    hasCommits: !!analysis?.commits,
   997‚Üí    hasArchDecisions: !!analysis?.architecturalDecisions,
   998‚Üí    analysisKeys: analysis ? Object.keys(analysis) : []
   999‚Üí  });
  1000‚Üí  
  1001‚Üí  // Try different sources for meaningful components
  1002‚Üí  if (analysis?.semanticInsights?.patterns) {
  1003‚Üí    components = analysis.semanticInsights.patterns.map((p: any) => p.name || p.pattern).slice(0, 8);
  1004‚Üí    log(`Using semantic insights patterns:`, 'debug', components);
  1005‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.codeAnalysis?.patterns) {
  1006‚Üí    components = analysis.codeAnalysis.patterns.map((p: any) => p.name || p.pattern).slice(0, 8);
  1007‚Üí    log(`Using code analysis patterns:`, 'debug', components);
  1008‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.commits && analysis.commits.length > 0) {
  1009‚Üí    // Extract components from git commit messages and file changes
  1010‚Üí    const fileTypes = new Set<string>();
  1011‚Üí    analysis.commits.forEach((commit: any) => {
  1012‚Üí      if (commit.files) {
  1013‚Üí        commit.files.forEach((file: any) => {
  1014‚Üí          const fileName = typeof file === 'string' ? file : String(file);
  1015‚Üí          const ext = fileName.split('.').pop();
  1016‚Üí          if (ext) {
  1017‚Üí            if (ext.includes('ts') || ext.includes('js')) fileTypes.add('TypeScript/JavaScript Engine');
  1018‚Üí            if (ext.includes('json')) fileTypes.add('Configuration Manager');
  1019‚Üí            if (ext.includes('md')) fileTypes.add('Documentation System');
  1020‚Üí            if (fileName.includes('agent')) fileTypes.add('Agent Framework');
  1021‚Üí            if (fileName.includes('mcp')) fileTypes.add('MCP Protocol Handler');
  1022‚Üí          }
  1023‚Üí        });
  1024‚Üí      }
  1025‚Üí    });
  1026‚Üí    components = Array.from(fileTypes).slice(0, 6);
  1027‚Üí    log(`Using components from git commits:`, 'debug', components);
  1028‚Üí  } else if (analysis?.architecturalDecisions) {
  1029‚Üí    // Use architectural decisions as components
  1030‚Üí    components = analysis.architecturalDecisions.map((d: any) => d.component || d.area || 'System Component').slice(0, 6);
  1031‚Üí    log(`Using architectural decisions:`, 'debug', components);
  1032‚Üí  }
  1033‚Üí  
  1034‚Üí  // Fallback to meaningful default components if still empty
  1035‚Üí  if (components.length === 0) {
  1036‚Üí    components = [
  1037‚Üí      "Semantic Analysis Engine", 
  1038‚Üí      "Knowledge Management System", 
  1039‚Üí      "PlantUML Generator",
  1040‚Üí      "<USER_ID_REDACTED> Assurance Agent",
  1041‚Üí      "MCP Protocol Handler"
  1042‚Üí    ];
  1043‚Üí  }
  1044‚Üí  
  1045‚Üí  const hasSharedMemory = components.some((p: string) => p.toLowerCase().includes("shared") || p.toLowerCase().includes("memory"));
  1046‚Üí  
  1047‚Üí  let diagram = `@startuml ${title.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-architecture
  1048‚Üí!theme plain
  1049‚Üítitle ${title} - Architecture Diagram
  1050‚Üí
  1051‚Üískinparam component {
  1052‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<service>> LightBlue
  1053‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<storage>> LightGreen
  1054‚Üí  BackgroundColor<<agent>> LightYellow
  1055‚Üí}
  1056‚Üí
  1057‚Üí`;
  1058‚Üí
  1059‚Üí  if (hasSharedMemory) {
  1060‚Üí    diagram += `package "Distributed System Architecture" {
  1061‚Üí  component "Service Orchestrator" as SO <<service>>
  1062‚Üí  component "Shared Memory Layer" as SM <<storage>>
  1063‚Üí  
  1064‚Üí  package "Domain Components" {
  1065‚Üí    component "UI Component" as UI <<agent>>
  1066‚Üí    component "Coding Component" as CODE <<agent>>
  1067‚Üí    component "RESI Component" as RESI <<agent>>
  1068‚Üí  }
  1069‚Üí  
  1070‚Üí  database "Persistent Storage" as DB <<storage>>
  1071‚Üí}
  1072‚Üí
  1073‚ÜíSO --> SM : Manages
  1074‚ÜíUI --> SM : Read/Write
  1075‚ÜíCODE --> SM : Read/Write
  1076‚ÜíRESI --> SM : Read/Write
  1077‚ÜíSM --> DB : Persist
  1078‚Üí
  1079‚Üí`;
  1080‚Üí  } else {
  1081‚Üí    diagram += `package "System Architecture" {
  1082‚Üí`;
  1083‚Üí    components.forEach((comp: string, idx: number) => {
  1084‚Üí      diagram += `  component "${comp}" as C${idx} <<service>>\n`;
  1085‚Üí    });
  1086‚Üí    
  1087‚Üí    // Add some relationships
  1088‚Üí    for (let i = 0; i < components.length - 1; i++) {
  1089‚Üí      diagram += `  C${i} --> C${i + 1} : interacts\n`;
  1090‚Üí    }
  1091‚Üí    
  1092‚Üí    diagram += `}`;
  1093‚Üí  }
  1094‚Üí  
  1095‚Üí  diagram += `
  1096‚Üí
  1097‚Üínote right
  1098‚Üí  Complexity Score: ${analysis?.complexity || "N/A"}/10
  1099‚Üí  Architecture Type: ${analysis?.architecture_type || "Distributed"}
  1100‚Üíend note
  1101‚Üí
  1102‚Üí@enduml`;
  1103‚Üí  
  1104‚Üí  return diagram;
  1105‚Üí}

    63‚Üíexport class SemanticAnalysisAgent {
    64‚Üí  private anthropicClient: Anthropic | null = null;
    65‚Üí  private openaiClient: OpenAI | null = null;
    66‚Üí  private repositoryPath: string;
    67‚Üí
    68‚Üí  constructor(repositoryPath: string = '.') {
    69‚Üí    this.repositoryPath = repositoryPath;
    70‚Üí    this.initializeClients();
    71‚Üí  }
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí  async analyzeGitAndVibeData(
    74‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
    75‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any,
    76‚Üí    options: {
    77‚Üí      maxFiles?: number;
    78‚Üí      includePatterns?: string[];
    79‚Üí      excludePatterns?: string[];
    80‚Üí      analysisDepth?: 'surface' | 'deep' | 'comprehensive';
    81‚Üí    } = {}
    82‚Üí  ): Promise<SemanticAnalysisResult> {
    83‚Üí    const startTime = Date.now();
    84‚Üí    
    85‚Üí    log('Starting comprehensive semantic analysis', 'info', {
    86‚Üí      gitCommits: gitAnalysis?.commits?.length || 0,
    87‚Üí      vibeSessions: vibeAnalysis?.sessions?.length || 0,
    88‚Üí      analysisDepth: options.analysisDepth || 'deep'
    89‚Üí    });
    90‚Üí
    91‚Üí    try {
    92‚Üí      // Extract files to analyze from git history
    93‚Üí      const filesToAnalyze = this.extractFilesFromGitHistory(gitAnalysis, options);
    94‚Üí      log(`Identified ${filesToAnalyze.length} files for analysis`, 'info');
    95‚Üí
    96‚Üí      // Perform deep code analysis
    97‚Üí      const codeFiles = await this.analyzeCodeFiles(filesToAnalyze, options);
    98‚Üí      
    99‚Üí      // Generate code analysis metrics
   100‚Üí      const codeAnalysis = this.generateCodeAnalysisMetrics(codeFiles);
   101‚Üí
   102‚Üí      // Perform cross-analysis correlation
   103‚Üí      const crossAnalysisInsights = await this.performCrossAnalysis(
   104‚Üí        codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis
   105‚Üí      );
   106‚Üí
   107‚Üí      // Generate semantic insights using LLM
   108‚Üí      const semanticInsights = await this.generateSemanticInsights(
   109‚Üí        codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, crossAnalysisInsights
   110‚Üí      );
   111‚Üí
   112‚Üí      const processingTime = Date.now() - startTime;
   113‚Üí      
   114‚Üí      // FIXED: Create aggregated insights for QA validation
   115‚Üí      const aggregatedInsights = [
   116‚Üí        ...semanticInsights.keyPatterns,
   117‚Üí        ...semanticInsights.learnings,
   118‚Üí        ...semanticInsights.architecturalDecisions
   119‚Üí      ].filter(Boolean).join('. ');
   120‚Üí      
   121‚Üí      const result: SemanticAnalysisResult = {
   122‚Üí        codeAnalysis,
   123‚Üí        crossAnalysisInsights,
   124‚Üí        semanticInsights,
   125‚Üí        insights: aggregatedInsights || 'No specific insights extracted from semantic analysis.',
   126‚Üí        confidence: this.calculateConfidence(codeFiles, crossAnalysisInsights),
   127‚Üí        processingTime
   128‚Üí      };
   129‚Üí
   130‚Üí      log('Semantic analysis completed', 'info', {
   131‚Üí        filesAnalyzed: codeFiles.length,
   132‚Üí        patternsFound: semanticInsights.keyPatterns.length,
   133‚Üí        confidence: result.confidence,
   134‚Üí        processingTime,
   135‚Üí        hasInsightsField: 'insights' in result,
   136‚Üí        insightsLength: result.insights ? result.insights.length : 0
   137‚Üí      });
   138‚Üí
   139‚Üí      return result;
   140‚Üí
   141‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   142‚Üí      log('Semantic analysis failed', 'error', error);
   143‚Üí      throw error;
   144‚Üí    }
   145‚Üí  }

   147‚Üí  private initializeClients(): void {
   148‚Üí    // Initialize Anthropic client
   149‚Üí    const anthropicKey = process.env.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY;
   150‚Üí    if (anthropicKey && anthropicKey !== "your-anthropic-api-key") {
   151‚Üí      this.anthropicClient = new Anthropic({
   152‚Üí        apiKey: anthropicKey,
   153‚Üí      });
   154‚Üí      log("Anthropic client initialized for semantic analysis", "info");
   155‚Üí    }
   156‚Üí
   157‚Üí    // Initialize OpenAI client
   158‚Üí    const openaiKey = process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY;
   159‚Üí    if (openaiKey && openaiKey !== "your-openai-api-key") {

   171‚Üí  private extractFilesFromGitHistory(
   172‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any, 
   173‚Üí    options: { maxFiles?: number; includePatterns?: string[]; excludePatterns?: string[] }
   174‚Üí  ): string[] {
   175‚Üí    const {
   176‚Üí      maxFiles = 50,
   177‚Üí      includePatterns = ['**/*.ts', '**/*.js', '**/*.json', '**/*.md'],
   178‚Üí      excludePatterns = ['node_modules/**', 'dist/**', '.git/**', '**/*.log']
   179‚Üí    } = options;
   180‚Üí
   181‚Üí    const filesSet = new Set<string>();
   182‚Üí
   183‚Üí    // Extract files from commits
   184‚Üí    if (gitAnalysis?.commits) {
   185‚Üí      gitAnalysis.commits.forEach((commit: any) => {
   186‚Üí        if (commit.files) {
   187‚Üí          commit.files.forEach((file: any) => {
   188‚Üí            if (this.shouldIncludeFile(file.path, includePatterns, excludePatterns)) {
   189‚Üí              filesSet.add(file.path);
   190‚Üí            }
   191‚Üí          });
   192‚Üí        }
   193‚Üí      });
   194‚Üí    }
   195‚Üí
   196‚Üí    // Extract files from architectural decisions
   197‚Üí    if (gitAnalysis?.architecturalDecisions) {
   198‚Üí      gitAnalysis.architecturalDecisions.forEach((decision: any) => {
   199‚Üí        if (decision.files) {
   200‚Üí          decision.files.forEach((filePath: string) => {
   201‚Üí            if (this.shouldIncludeFile(filePath, includePatterns, excludePatterns)) {
   202‚Üí              filesSet.add(filePath);
   203‚Üí            }
   204‚Üí          });
   205‚Üí        }
   206‚Üí      });
   207‚Üí    }
   208‚Üí
   209‚Üí    // Convert to array and limit
   210‚Üí    const files = Array.from(filesSet).slice(0, maxFiles);
   211‚Üí    
   212‚Üí    log(`File extraction: ${filesSet.size} unique files found, analyzing top ${files.length}`, 'info');
   213‚Üí    return files;
   214‚Üí  }
   215‚Üí
   216‚Üí  private shouldIncludeFile(
   217‚Üí    filePath: string, 
   218‚Üí    includePatterns: string[], 
   219‚Üí    excludePatterns: string[]
   220‚Üí  ): boolean {
   221‚Üí    // Check exclude patterns first
   222‚Üí    for (const pattern of excludePatterns) {
   223‚Üí      const regex = new RegExp(pattern.replace(/\*\*/g, '.*').replace(/\*/g, '[^/]*'));
   224‚Üí      if (regex.test(filePath)) {
   225‚Üí        return false;
   226‚Üí      }
   227‚Üí    }
   228‚Üí
   229‚Üí    // Check include patterns
   230‚Üí    for (const pattern of includePatterns) {
   231‚Üí      const regex = new RegExp(pattern.replace(/\*\*/g, '.*').replace(/\*/g, '[^/]*'));
   232‚Üí      if (regex.test(filePath)) {
   233‚Üí        return true;
   234‚Üí      }
   235‚Üí    }
   236‚Üí
   237‚Üí    return false;
   238‚Üí  }
   239‚Üí
   240‚Üí  private async analyzeCodeFiles(
   241‚Üí    filePaths: string[], 
   242‚Üí    options: { analysisDepth?: string }
   243‚Üí  ): Promise<CodeFile[]> {
   244‚Üí    const codeFiles: CodeFile[] = [];
   245‚Üí    const depth = options.analysisDepth || 'deep';
   246‚Üí
   247‚Üí    for (const filePath of filePaths) {
   248‚Üí      try {
   249‚Üí        const fullPath = path.join(this.repositoryPath, filePath);
   250‚Üí        
   251‚Üí        if (!fs.existsSync(fullPath)) {
   252‚Üí          log(`File not found: ${filePath}`, 'warning');
   253‚Üí          continue;
   254‚Üí        }
   255‚Üí
   256‚Üí        const stats = fs.statSync(fullPath);
   257‚Üí        if (stats.size > 1024 * 1024) { // Skip files > 1MB
   258‚Üí          log(`Skipping large file: ${filePath} (${stats.size} bytes)`, 'info');
   259‚Üí          continue;
   260‚Üí        }
   261‚Üí
   262‚Üí        const content = fs.readFileSync(fullPath, 'utf8');
   263‚Üí        const language = this.detectLanguage(filePath);
   264‚Üí
   265‚Üí        const codeFile: CodeFile = {
   266‚Üí          path: filePath,
   267‚Üí          content,
   268‚Üí          language,
   269‚Üí          size: content.length,
   270‚Üí          complexity: this.calculateComplexity(content, language),
   271‚Üí          patterns: this.detectCodePatterns(content, language),
   272‚Üí          functions: this.extractFunctions(content, language),
   273‚Üí          imports: this.extractImports(content, language),
   274‚Üí          changeType: 'modified' // Default, could be enhanced with git diff analysis
   275‚Üí        };
   276‚Üí
   277‚Üí        codeFiles.push(codeFile);
   278‚Üí
   279‚Üí      } catch (error) {
   280‚Üí        log(`Error analyzing file ${filePath}`, 'warning', error);
   281‚Üí      }
   282‚Üí    }
   283‚Üí
   284‚Üí    log(`Code analysis completed: ${codeFiles.length} files processed`, 'info');
   285‚Üí    return codeFiles;
   286‚Üí  }
   287‚Üí
   288‚Üí  private detectLanguage(filePath: string): string {
   289‚Üí    const ext = path.extname(filePath).toLowerCase();
   290‚Üí    const languageMap: Record<string, string> = {
   291‚Üí      '.ts': 'typescript',
   292‚Üí      '.js': 'javascript',
   293‚Üí      '.jsx': 'javascript',
   294‚Üí      '.tsx': 'typescript',
   295‚Üí      '.json': 'json',
   296‚Üí      '.md': 'markdown',
   297‚Üí      '.py': 'python',
   298‚Üí      '.java': 'java',
   299‚Üí      '.cpp': 'cpp',
   300‚Üí      '.c': 'c',
   301‚Üí      '.go': 'go',
   302‚Üí      '.rs': 'rust',
   303‚Üí      '.php': 'php',
   304‚Üí      '.rb': 'ruby',
   305‚Üí      '.yml': 'yaml',
   306‚Üí      '.yaml': 'yaml'
   307‚Üí    };
   308‚Üí
   309‚Üí    return languageMap[ext] || 'text';
   310‚Üí  }
   311‚Üí
   312‚Üí  private calculateComplexity(content: string, language: string): number {
   313‚Üí    // Simple cyclomatic complexity estimation
   314‚Üí    let complexity = 1; // Base complexity
   315‚Üí
   316‚Üí    // Count decision points based on language
   317‚Üí    const patterns = {
   318‚Üí      typescript: /\b(if|else|while|for|switch|case|catch|&&|\|\||\?)\b/g,
   319‚Üí      javascript: /\b(if|else|while|for|switch|case|catch|&&|\|\||\?)\b/g,
   320‚Üí      python: /\b(if|elif|else|while|for|try|except|and|or)\b/g,
   321‚Üí      java: /\b(if|else|while|for|switch|case|catch|&&|\|\||\?)\b/g
   322‚Üí    };
   323‚Üí
   324‚Üí    const pattern = patterns[language as keyof typeof patterns] || patterns.javascript;
   325‚Üí    const matches = content.match(pattern);
   326‚Üí    
   327‚Üí    if (matches) {
   328‚Üí      complexity += matches.length;
   329‚Üí    }
   330‚Üí
   331‚Üí    return Math.min(complexity, 50); // Cap at 50 for sanity
   332‚Üí  }
   333‚Üí
   334‚Üí  private detectCodePatterns(content: string, language: string): string[] {
   335‚Üí    const patterns: string[] = [];
   336‚Üí
   337‚Üí    // Common architectural patterns
   338‚Üí    const patternMatches = [
   339‚Üí      { pattern: 'singleton', regex: /class\s+\w+\s*{[\s\S]*?private\s+static\s+instance/i },
   340‚Üí      { pattern: 'factory', regex: /create\w*\s*\([^)]*\)[\s\S]*?return\s+new/i },
   341‚Üí      { pattern: 'observer', regex: /(addEventListener|subscribe|notify|Observer)/i },
   342‚Üí      { pattern: 'promise', regex: /(Promise|async|await)/i },
   343‚Üí      { pattern: 'decorator', regex: /@\w+/g },
   344‚Üí      { pattern: 'middleware', regex: /(middleware|next\(\)|express)/i },
   345‚Üí      { pattern: 'repository', regex: /Repository|DataAccess/i },
   346‚Üí      { pattern: 'service', regex: /Service|Provider/i },
   347‚Üí      { pattern: 'component', regex: /(React\.|Component|useState|useEffect)/i },
   348‚Üí      { pattern: 'api', regex: /(fetch|axios|http|api)/i }
   349‚Üí    ];
   350‚Üí
   351‚Üí    for (const { pattern, regex } of patternMatches) {
   352‚Üí      if (regex.test(content)) {
   353‚Üí        patterns.push(pattern);
   354‚Üí      }
   355‚Üí    }
   356‚Üí
   357‚Üí    return patterns;
   358‚Üí  }
   359‚Üí
   360‚Üí  private extractFunctions(content: string, language: string): string[] {
   361‚Üí    const functions: string[] = [];
   362‚Üí
   363‚Üí    // Language-specific function extraction
   364‚Üí    let functionRegex: RegExp;
   365‚Üí
   366‚Üí    switch (language) {
   367‚Üí      case 'typescript':
   368‚Üí      case 'javascript':
   369‚Üí        functionRegex = /(?:function\s+(\w+)|(\w+)\s*\([^)]*\)\s*(?:=>|\{)|(?:async\s+)?(\w+)\s*\([^)]*\)\s*(?:=>|\{))/g;
   370‚Üí        break;
   371‚Üí      case 'python':
   372‚Üí        functionRegex = /def\s+(\w+)\s*\(/g;
   373‚Üí        break;
   374‚Üí      case 'java':
   375‚Üí        functionRegex = /(?:public|private|protected)?\s*(?:static)?\s*\w+\s+(\w+)\s*\(/g;
   376‚Üí        break;
   377‚Üí      default:
   378‚Üí        functionRegex = /function\s+(\w+)|(\w+)\s*\(/g;
   379‚Üí    }
   380‚Üí
   381‚Üí    let match;
   382‚Üí    while ((match = functionRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
   383‚Üí      const functionName = match[1] || match[2] || match[3];
   384‚Üí      if (functionName && functionName !== 'if' && functionName !== 'for') {
   385‚Üí        functions.push(functionName);
   386‚Üí      }
   387‚Üí    }
   388‚Üí
   389‚Üí    return [...new Set(functions)]; // Remove duplicates
   390‚Üí  }
   391‚Üí
   392‚Üí  private extractImports(content: string, language: string): string[] {
   393‚Üí    const imports: string[] = [];
   394‚Üí
   395‚Üí    // Language-specific import extraction
   396‚Üí    let importRegex: RegExp;
   397‚Üí
   398‚Üí    switch (language) {
   399‚Üí      case 'typescript':
   400‚Üí      case 'javascript':
   401‚Üí        importRegex = /import\s+(?:.*?\s+from\s+)?['"`]([^'"`]+)['"`]/g;
   402‚Üí        break;
   403‚Üí      case 'python':
   404‚Üí        importRegex = /(?:from\s+(\S+)\s+import|import\s+([^;\n]+))/g;
   405‚Üí        break;
   406‚Üí      case 'java':
   407‚Üí        importRegex = /import\s+([^;\n]+);/g;
   408‚Üí        break;
   409‚Üí      default:
   410‚Üí        importRegex = /import\s+['"`]([^'"`]+)['"`]/g;
   411‚Üí    }
   412‚Üí
   413‚Üí    let match;
   414‚Üí    while ((match = importRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
   415‚Üí      const importPath = match[1] || match[2];
   416‚Üí      if (importPath) {
   417‚Üí        imports.push(importPath.trim());
   418‚Üí      }
   419‚Üí    }
   420‚Üí
   421‚Üí    return [...new Set(imports)]; // Remove duplicates
   422‚Üí  }
   423‚Üí
   424‚Üí  private generateCodeAnalysisMetrics(codeFiles: CodeFile[]): SemanticAnalysisResult['codeAnalysis'] {
   425‚Üí    const totalLinesOfCode = codeFiles.reduce((sum, file) => 
   426‚Üí      sum + file.content.split('\n').length, 0
   427‚Üí    );
   428‚Üí
   429‚Üí    // Language distribution
   430‚Üí    const languageDistribution: Record<string, number> = {};
   431‚Üí    codeFiles.forEach(file => {
   432‚Üí      languageDistribution[file.language] = (languageDistribution[file.language] || 0) + 1;
   433‚Üí    });
   434‚Üí
   435‚Üí    // Complexity metrics
   436‚Üí    const complexities = codeFiles.map(f => f.complexity);
   437‚Üí    const averageComplexity = complexities.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) / complexities.length;
   438‚Üí    const highComplexityFiles = codeFiles
   439‚Üí      .filter(f => f.complexity > 10)
   440‚Üí      .map(f => f.path);
   441‚Üí    const totalFunctions = codeFiles.reduce((sum, f) => sum + f.functions.length, 0);
   442‚Üí
   443‚Üí    // Architectural patterns
   444‚Üí    const patternCounts = new Map<string, { files: string[]; count: number }>();
   445‚Üí    codeFiles.forEach(file => {
   446‚Üí      file.patterns.forEach(pattern => {
   447‚Üí        if (!patternCounts.has(pattern)) {
   448‚Üí          patternCounts.set(pattern, { files: [], count: 0 });
   449‚Üí        }
   450‚Üí        const data = patternCounts.get(pattern)!;
   451‚Üí        data.files.push(file.path);
   452‚Üí        data.count++;
   453‚Üí      });
   454‚Üí    });
   455‚Üí
   456‚Üí    const architecturalPatterns = Array.from(patternCounts.entries())
   457‚Üí      .map(([name, data]) => ({
   458‚Üí        name,
   459‚Üí        files: data.files,
   460‚Üí        description: this.getPatternDescription(name),
   461‚Üí        confidence: Math.min(data.count / codeFiles.length, 1)
   462‚Üí      }))
   463‚Üí      .sort((a, b) => b.confidence - a.confidence);
   464‚Üí
   465‚Üí    // Code <USER_ID_REDACTED> assessment
   466‚Üí    const codeQuality = this.assessCodeQuality(codeFiles);
   467‚Üí
   468‚Üí    return {
   469‚Üí      filesAnalyzed: codeFiles.length,
   470‚Üí      totalLinesOfCode,
   471‚Üí      languageDistribution,
   472‚Üí      complexityMetrics: {
   473‚Üí        averageComplexity: Math.round(averageComplexity * 100) / 100,
   474‚Üí        highComplexityFiles,
   475‚Üí        totalFunctions
   476‚Üí      },
   477‚Üí      architecturalPatterns,
   478‚Üí      codeQuality
   479‚Üí    };
   480‚Üí  }
   481‚Üí
   482‚Üí  private getPatternDescription(pattern: string): string {
   483‚Üí    const descriptions: Record<string, string> = {
   484‚Üí      singleton: 'Ensures a class has only one instance',
   485‚Üí      factory: 'Creates objects without specifying exact classes',
   486‚Üí      observer: 'Defines one-to-many dependency between objects',
   487‚Üí      promise: 'Handles asynchronous operations',
   488‚Üí      decorator: 'Adds behavior to objects dynamically',
   489‚Üí      middleware: 'Processes requests in a pipeline',
   490‚Üí      repository: 'Encapsulates data access logic',
   491‚Üí      service: 'Contains business logic',
   492‚Üí      component: 'Reusable UI building blocks',
   493‚Üí      api: 'Handles external communication'
   494‚Üí    };
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üí    return descriptions[pattern] || `${pattern} pattern implementation`;
   497‚Üí  }
   498‚Üí
   499‚Üí  private assessCodeQuality(codeFiles: CodeFile[]): { score: number; issues: string[]; recommendations: string[] } {
   500‚Üí    const issues: string[] = [];
   501‚Üí    const recommendations: string[] = [];
   502‚Üí    let score = 100;
   503‚Üí
   504‚Üí    // Check for high complexity
   505‚Üí    const highComplexityCount = codeFiles.filter(f => f.complexity > 15).length;
   506‚Üí    if (highComplexityCount > 0) {
   507‚Üí      issues.push(`${highComplexityCount} files have high complexity (>15)`);
   508‚Üí      recommendations.push('Consider refactoring complex functions into smaller ones');
   509‚Üí      score -= highComplexityCount * 5;
   510‚Üí    }
   511‚Üí
   512‚Üí    // Check for large files
   513‚Üí    const largeFiles = codeFiles.filter(f => f.content.split('\n').length > 500);
   514‚Üí    if (largeFiles.length > 0) {
   515‚Üí      issues.push(`${largeFiles.length} files exceed 500 lines`);
   516‚Üí      recommendations.push('Break down large files into smaller, focused modules');
   517‚Üí      score -= largeFiles.length * 3;
   518‚Üí    }
   519‚Üí
   520‚Üí    // Check for missing patterns
   521‚Üí    const hasServices = codeFiles.some(f => f.patterns.includes('service'));
   522‚Üí    const hasComponents = codeFiles.some(f => f.patterns.includes('component'));
   523‚Üí    if (!hasServices && codeFiles.length > 5) {
   524‚Üí      recommendations.push('Consider implementing service layer for better separation of concerns');
   525‚Üí    }
   526‚Üí
   527‚Üí    return {
   528‚Üí      score: Math.max(0, score),
   529‚Üí      issues,
   530‚Üí      recommendations
   531‚Üí    };
   532‚Üí  }
   533‚Üí
   534‚Üí  private async performCrossAnalysis(
   535‚Üí    codeFiles: CodeFile[],
   536‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
   537‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any
   538‚Üí  ): Promise<SemanticAnalysisResult['crossAnalysisInsights']> {
   539‚Üí    const gitCodeCorrelation: string[] = [];
   540‚Üí    const vibeCodeCorrelation: string[] = [];
   541‚Üí    const conversationImplementationMap: any[] = [];
   542‚Üí
   543‚Üí    // Correlate git patterns with code patterns
   544‚Üí    if (gitAnalysis?.codeEvolution) {
   545‚Üí      gitAnalysis.codeEvolution.forEach((pattern: any) => {
   546‚Üí        const relatedFiles = codeFiles.filter(file => 
   547‚Üí          pattern.files.some((gitFile: any) => {
   548‚Üí            const fileName = typeof gitFile === 'string' ? gitFile : String(gitFile);
   549‚Üí            return file.path.includes(fileName);
   550‚Üí          })
   551‚Üí        );
   552‚Üí        if (relatedFiles.length > 0) {
   553‚Üí          const codePatterns = [...new Set(relatedFiles.flatMap(f => f.patterns))];
   554‚Üí          gitCodeCorrelation.push(
   555‚Üí            `Git pattern "${pattern.pattern}" correlates with code patterns: ${codePatterns.join(', ')}`
   556‚Üí          );
   557‚Üí        }
   558‚Üí      });
   559‚Üí    }
   560‚Üí
   561‚Üí    // Correlate conversation themes with code implementation
   562‚Üí    if (vibeAnalysis?.problemSolutionPairs) {
   563‚Üí      vibeAnalysis.problemSolutionPairs.forEach((pair: any) => {
   564‚Üí        const implementationFiles = codeFiles.filter(file =>
   565‚Üí          pair.solution.technologies.some((tech: string) => 
   566‚Üí            file.language.toLowerCase().includes(tech.toLowerCase()) ||
   567‚Üí            file.content.toLowerCase().includes(tech.toLowerCase())
   568‚Üí          )
   569‚Üí        );
   570‚Üí
   571‚Üí        if (implementationFiles.length > 0) {
   572‚Üí          conversationImplementationMap.push({
   573‚Üí            problem: pair.problem.description.substring(0, 100) + '...',
   574‚Üí            implementation: implementationFiles.flatMap(f => f.patterns),
   575‚Üí            files: implementationFiles.map(f => f.path)
   576‚Üí          });
   577‚Üí
   578‚Üí          vibeCodeCorrelation.push(
   579‚Üí            `Problem "${pair.problem.description.substring(0, 50)}..." implemented using ${implementationFiles.map(f => f.language).join(', ')}`
   580‚Üí          );
   581‚Üí        }
   582‚Üí      });
   583‚Üí    }
   584‚Üí
   585‚Üí    return {
   586‚Üí      gitCodeCorrelation,
   587‚Üí      vibeCodeCorrelation,
   588‚Üí      conversationImplementationMap
   589‚Üí    };
   590‚Üí  }
   591‚Üí
   592‚Üí  private async generateSemanticInsights(
   593‚Üí    codeFiles: CodeFile[],
   594‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
   595‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any,
   596‚Üí    crossAnalysis: any
   597‚Üí  ): Promise<SemanticAnalysisResult['semanticInsights']> {
   598‚Üí    // Generate insights using LLM if available
   599‚Üí    if (this.anthropicClient || this.openaiClient) {
   600‚Üí      return await this.generateLLMInsights(codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, crossAnalysis);
   601‚Üí    }
   602‚Üí
   603‚Üí    // Fallback to rule-based insights
   604‚Üí    return this.generateRuleBasedInsights(codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, crossAnalysis);
   605‚Üí  }
   606‚Üí
   607‚Üí  private async generateLLMInsights(
   608‚Üí    codeFiles: CodeFile[],
   609‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
   610‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any,
   611‚Üí    crossAnalysis: any
   612‚Üí  ): Promise<SemanticAnalysisResult['semanticInsights']> {
   613‚Üí    try {
   614‚Üí      const analysisPrompt = this.buildAnalysisPrompt(codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, crossAnalysis);
   615‚Üí      
   616‚Üí      let response: string;
   617‚Üí      
   618‚Üí      // Try Anthropic first with rate limit handling
   619‚Üí      if (this.anthropicClient) {
   620‚Üí        try {
   621‚Üí          response = await this.callAnthropicWithRetry(analysisPrompt);
   622‚Üí        } catch (anthropicError: any) {
   623‚Üí          log('Anthropic call failed, trying OpenAI fallback', 'warning', {
   624‚Üí            error: anthropicError.message,
   625‚Üí            status: anthropicError.status
   626‚Üí          });
   627‚Üí          
   628‚Üí          // If Anthropic fails due to rate limiting, try OpenAI
   629‚Üí          if (this.openaiClient && this.isRateLimitError(anthropicError)) {
   630‚Üí            response = await this.callOpenAIWithRetry(analysisPrompt);
   631‚Üí          } else {
   632‚Üí            throw anthropicError;
   633‚Üí          }
   634‚Üí        }
   635‚Üí      } else if (this.openaiClient) {
   636‚Üí        response = await this.callOpenAIWithRetry(analysisPrompt);
   637‚Üí      } else {
   638‚Üí        throw new Error('No LLM client available');
   639‚Üí      }
   640‚Üí
   641‚Üí      return this.parseInsightsFromLLMResponse(response);
   642‚Üí
   643‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   644‚Üí      log('LLM insight generation failed, falling back to rule-based', 'warning', error);
   645‚Üí      return this.generateRuleBasedInsights(codeFiles, gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, crossAnalysis);
   646‚Üí    }
   647‚Üí  }
   648‚Üí
   649‚Üí  /**
   650‚Üí   * Check if an error is a rate limit error
   651‚Üí   */
   652‚Üí  private isRateLimitError(error: any): boolean {
   653‚Üí    return error.status === 429 || 
   654‚Üí           error.message?.includes('rate_limit') ||
   655‚Üí           error.message?.includes('Rate limit') ||
   656‚Üí           error.error?.error?.type === 'rate_limit_error';
   657‚Üí  }
   658‚Üí
   659‚Üí  /**
   660‚Üí   * Sleep for a given number of milliseconds
   661‚Üí   */
   662‚Üí  private async sleep(ms: number): Promise<void> {
   663‚Üí    return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
   664‚Üí  }
   665‚Üí
   666‚Üí  /**
   667‚Üí   * Call Anthropic with exponential backoff retry
   668‚Üí   */
   669‚Üí  private async callAnthropicWithRetry(prompt: string, maxRetries: number = 3): Promise<string> {
   670‚Üí    let lastError: any;
   671‚Üí    
   672‚Üí    for (let attempt = 0; attempt < maxRetries; attempt++) {
   673‚Üí      try {
   674‚Üí        log(`Calling Anthropic API (attempt ${attempt + 1}/${maxRetries})`, 'info');
   675‚Üí        
   676‚Üí        const result = await this.anthropicClient!.messages.create({
   677‚Üí          model: "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022",
   678‚Üí          max_tokens: 2000,
   679‚Üí          messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }]
   680‚Üí        });
   681‚Üí        
   682‚Üí        const response = result.content[0].type === 'text' ? result.content[0].text : '';
   683‚Üí        log(`Anthropic API call successful`, 'info', {
   684‚Üí          responseLength: response.length,
   685‚Üí          attempt: attempt + 1
   686‚Üí        });
   687‚Üí        
   688‚Üí        return response;
   689‚Üí        
   690‚Üí      } catch (error: any) {
   691‚Üí        lastError = error;
   692‚Üí        
   693‚Üí        if (this.isRateLimitError(error)) {
   694‚Üí          const backoffMs = Math.min(1000 * Math.pow(2, attempt), 30000); // Max 30 seconds
   695‚Üí          log(`Rate limited, retrying in ${backoffMs}ms`, 'warning', {
   696‚Üí            attempt: attempt + 1,
   697‚Üí            maxRetries,
   698‚Üí            status: error.status,
   699‚Üí            backoffMs
   700‚Üí          });
   701‚Üí          
   702‚Üí          if (attempt < maxRetries - 1) {
   703‚Üí            await this.sleep(backoffMs);
   704‚Üí            continue;
   705‚Üí          }
   706‚Üí        }
   707‚Üí        
   708‚Üí        // For non-rate-limit errors, don't retry
   709‚Üí        log(`Anthropic API call failed`, 'error', {
   710‚Üí          attempt: attempt + 1,
   711‚Üí          error: error.message,
   712‚Üí          status: error.status
   713‚Üí        });
   714‚Üí        break;
   715‚Üí      }
   716‚Üí    }
   717‚Üí    
   718‚Üí    throw lastError;
   719‚Üí  }
   720‚Üí
   721‚Üí  /**
   722‚Üí   * Call OpenAI with exponential backoff retry
   723‚Üí   */
   724‚Üí  private async callOpenAIWithRetry(prompt: string, maxRetries: number = 3): Promise<string> {
   725‚Üí    let lastError: any;
   726‚Üí    
   727‚Üí    for (let attempt = 0; attempt < maxRetries; attempt++) {
   728‚Üí      try {
   729‚Üí        log(`Calling OpenAI API (attempt ${attempt + 1}/${maxRetries})`, 'info');
   730‚Üí        
   731‚Üí        const result = await this.openaiClient!.chat.completions.create({
   732‚Üí          model: "gpt-4",
   733‚Üí          max_tokens: 2000,
   734‚Üí          messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }]
   735‚Üí        });
   736‚Üí        
   737‚Üí        const response = result.choices[0]?.message?.content || '';
   738‚Üí        log(`OpenAI API call successful`, 'info', {
   739‚Üí          responseLength: response.length,
   740‚Üí          attempt: attempt + 1
   741‚Üí        });
   742‚Üí        
   743‚Üí        return response;
   744‚Üí        
   745‚Üí      } catch (error: any) {
   746‚Üí        lastError = error;
   747‚Üí        
   748‚Üí        if (this.isRateLimitError(error)) {
   749‚Üí          const backoffMs = Math.min(1000 * Math.pow(2, attempt), 30000); // Max 30 seconds
   750‚Üí          log(`Rate limited, retrying in ${backoffMs}ms`, 'warning', {
   751‚Üí            attempt: attempt + 1,
   752‚Üí            maxRetries,
   753‚Üí            status: error.status,
   754‚Üí            backoffMs
   755‚Üí          });
   756‚Üí          
   757‚Üí          if (attempt < maxRetries - 1) {
   758‚Üí            await this.sleep(backoffMs);
   759‚Üí            continue;
   760‚Üí          }
   761‚Üí        }
   762‚Üí        
   763‚Üí        // For non-rate-limit errors, don't retry
   764‚Üí        log(`OpenAI API call failed`, 'error', {
   765‚Üí          attempt: attempt + 1,
   766‚Üí          error: error.message,
   767‚Üí          status: error.status
   768‚Üí        });
   769‚Üí        break;
   770‚Üí      }
   771‚Üí    }
   772‚Üí    
   773‚Üí    throw lastError;
   774‚Üí  }

   776‚Üí  private buildAnalysisPrompt(

   778‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
   779‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any,
   780‚Üí    crossAnalysis: any

   787‚Üí      complexity: file.complexity
   788‚Üí    }));
   789‚Üí
   790‚Üí    return `Analyze this software development session and provide key insights:
   791‚Üí
   792‚ÜíCODE ANALYSIS:
   793‚Üí${JSON.stringify(codeOverview, null, 2)}
   794‚Üí

   797‚Üí- Architectural decisions: ${gitAnalysis?.architecturalDecisions?.length || 0}
   798‚Üí- Code evolution patterns: ${gitAnalysis?.codeEvolution?.map((p: any) => p.pattern).join(', ') || 'None'}
   799‚Üí
   800‚ÜíCONVERSATION ANALYSIS:

   803‚Üí- Main themes: ${vibeAnalysis?.patterns?.developmentThemes?.map((t: any) => t.theme).join(', ') || 'None'}
   804‚Üí
   805‚ÜíCROSS-ANALYSIS:
   806‚Üí${crossAnalysis.gitCodeCorrelation.join('\n')}
   807‚Üí${crossAnalysis.vibeCodeCorrelation.join('\n')}
   808‚Üí
   809‚ÜíPlease provide insights in JSON format:

   826‚Üí  private parseInsightsFromLLMResponse(response: string): SemanticAnalysisResult['semanticInsights'] {
   827‚Üí    try {
   828‚Üí      // Try to extract JSON from response
   829‚Üí      const jsonMatch = response.match(/\{[\s\S]*\}/);
   830‚Üí      if (jsonMatch) {
   831‚Üí        const parsed = JSON.parse(jsonMatch[0]);
   832‚Üí        return {
   833‚Üí          keyPatterns: parsed.keyPatterns || [],
   834‚Üí          architecturalDecisions: parsed.architecturalDecisions || [],
   835‚Üí          technicalDebt: parsed.technicalDebt || [],
   836‚Üí          innovativeApproaches: parsed.innovativeApproaches || [],
   837‚Üí          learnings: parsed.learnings || []
   838‚Üí        };
   839‚Üí      }
   840‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   841‚Üí      log('Failed to parse LLM response as JSON', 'warning', error);
   842‚Üí    }
   843‚Üí
   844‚Üí    // Fallback: extract insights from text
   845‚Üí    return {
   846‚Üí      keyPatterns: this.extractPatternFromText(response, 'pattern'),
   847‚Üí      architecturalDecisions: this.extractPatternFromText(response, 'decision|architecture'),
   848‚Üí      technicalDebt: this.extractPatternFromText(response, 'debt|improvement|refactor'),
   849‚Üí      innovativeApproaches: this.extractPatternFromText(response, 'innovative|creative|novel'),
   850‚Üí      learnings: this.extractPatternFromText(response, 'learning|insight|lesson')
   851‚Üí    };
   852‚Üí  }
   853‚Üí
   854‚Üí  private extractPatternFromText(text: string, pattern: string): string[] {
   855‚Üí    const regex = new RegExp(`(?:${pattern})[^.]*`, 'gi');
   856‚Üí    const matches = text.match(regex);
   857‚Üí    return matches ? matches.slice(0, 5) : [];
   858‚Üí  }

   860‚Üí  private generateRuleBasedInsights(
   861‚Üí    codeFiles: CodeFile[],
   862‚Üí    gitAnalysis: any,
   863‚Üí    vibeAnalysis: any,
   864‚Üí    crossAnalysis: any
   865‚Üí  ): SemanticAnalysisResult['semanticInsights'] {
   866‚Üí    // Extract insights from git analysis if available
   867‚Üí    const keyPatterns = codeFiles?.length > 0 
   868‚Üí      ? [...new Set(codeFiles.flatMap(f => f.patterns))]
   869‚Üí      : (gitAnalysis?.patterns || []).map((p: any) => p.name || p);
   870‚Üí    
   871‚Üí    const architecturalDecisions = gitAnalysis?.architecturalDecisions
   872‚Üí      ?.map((d: any) => `${d.type || 'Decision'}: ${d.description || d}`)
   873‚Üí      .slice(0, 5) || [];
   874‚Üí
   875‚Üí    // Get technical debt from code analysis or git commits
   876‚Üí    const technicalDebt = codeFiles?.length > 0
   877‚Üí      ? codeFiles.filter(f => f.complexity > 15)
   878‚Üí          .map(f => `High complexity in ${f.path} (${f.complexity})`).slice(0, 3)
   879‚Üí      : gitAnalysis?.commits?.filter((c: any) => c.message?.includes('fix') || c.message?.includes('refactor'))
   880‚Üí          .map((c: any) => `Technical fix: ${c.message?.substring(0, 50)}...`).slice(0, 3) || [];
   881‚Üí
   882‚Üí    // Generate insights from conversation analysis
   883‚Üí    const innovativeApproaches = crossAnalysis?.conversationImplementationMap?.length > 0
   884‚Üí      ? crossAnalysis.conversationImplementationMap
   885‚Üí          .map((m: any) => `Implemented ${m.implementation?.join(', ') || 'solution'} for: ${m.problem}`)
   886‚Üí          .slice(0, 3)
   887‚Üí      : vibeAnalysis?.sessions?.map((s: any) => `Development insight from session: ${s.content?.substring(0, 50)}...`).slice(0, 3) || [];
   888‚Üí
   889‚Üí    // Generate meaningful learnings even without code files
   890‚Üí    const learnings = [];
   891‚Üí    
   892‚Üí    if (codeFiles?.length > 0) {
   893‚Üí      learnings.push(`Primary development language: ${this.getMostUsedLanguage(codeFiles)}`);
   894‚Üí      learnings.push(`Code <USER_ID_REDACTED> score: ${this.calculateOverallQuality(codeFiles)}%`);
   895‚Üí    } else {
   896‚Üí      learnings.push(`Analysis based on git history with ${gitAnalysis?.commits?.length || 0} commits`);
   897‚Üí      learnings.push(`Repository contains ${gitAnalysis?.totalChanges || 0} total changes`);
   898‚Üí    }
   899‚Üí    
   900‚Üí    learnings.push(`Most common pattern: ${keyPatterns[0] || 'Pattern analysis in progress'}`);
   901‚Üí    
   902‚Üí    if (gitAnalysis?.summary) {
   903‚Üí      learnings.push(`Repository focus: ${gitAnalysis.summary}`);
   904‚Üí    }
   905‚Üí
   906‚Üí    log('Generated rule-based insights', 'info', {
   907‚Üí      keyPatterns: keyPatterns.length,
   908‚Üí      architecturalDecisions: architecturalDecisions.length,
   909‚Üí      technicalDebt: technicalDebt.length,
   910‚Üí      innovativeApproaches: innovativeApproaches.length,
   911‚Üí      learnings: learnings.length
   912‚Üí    });
   913‚Üí
   914‚Üí    return {
   915‚Üí      keyPatterns,
   916‚Üí      architecturalDecisions,
   917‚Üí      technicalDebt,
   918‚Üí      innovativeApproaches,
   919‚Üí      learnings
   920‚Üí    };
   921‚Üí  }
   922‚Üí
   923‚Üí  private getMostUsedLanguage(codeFiles: CodeFile[]): string {
   924‚Üí    const counts = new Map<string, number>();
   925‚Üí    codeFiles.forEach(file => {
   926‚Üí      counts.set(file.language, (counts.get(file.language) || 0) + 1);
   927‚Üí    });
   928‚Üí    
   929‚Üí    return Array.from(counts.entries())
   930‚Üí      .sort((a, b) => b[1] - a[1])[0]?.[0] || 'unknown';
   931‚Üí  }
   932‚Üí
   933‚Üí  private calculateOverallQuality(codeFiles: CodeFile[]): number {
   934‚Üí    const avgComplexity = codeFiles.reduce((sum, f) => sum + f.complexity, 0) / codeFiles.length;
   935‚Üí    const complexityScore = Math.max(0, 100 - (avgComplexity - 5) * 10);
   936‚Üí    
   937‚Üí    const patternScore = Math.min(100, codeFiles.flatMap(f => f.patterns).length * 10);
   938‚Üí    
   939‚Üí    return Math.round((complexityScore + patternScore) / 2);
   940‚Üí  }
   941‚Üí
   942‚Üí  private calculateConfidence(codeFiles: CodeFile[], crossAnalysis: any): number {
   943‚Üí    let confidence = 0.5; // Base confidence
   944‚Üí    
   945‚Üí    // More files analyzed = higher confidence
   946‚Üí    confidence += Math.min(0.3, codeFiles.length * 0.02);
   947‚Üí    
   948‚Üí    // Cross-analysis correlations increase confidence
   949‚Üí    confidence += Math.min(0.2, crossAnalysis.gitCodeCorrelation.length * 0.05);
   950‚Üí    confidence += Math.min(0.2, crossAnalysis.vibeCodeCorrelation.length * 0.05);
   951‚Üí    
   952‚Üí    return Math.min(1, confidence);
   953‚Üí  }

    78‚Üí
    79‚Üí  constructor(repositoryPath: string = '.') {

    89‚Üí  async generateComprehensiveInsights(params: any): Promise<InsightGenerationResult> {
    90‚Üí    log('generateComprehensiveInsights called', 'info');
    91‚Üí    const startTime = Date.now();
    92‚Üí    
    93‚Üí    // Extract parameters from the params object
    94‚Üí    const gitAnalysis = params.git_analysis_results || params.gitAnalysis;
    95‚Üí    const vibeAnalysis = params.vibe_analysis_results || params.vibeAnalysis;
    96‚Üí    const semanticAnalysis = params.semantic_analysis_results || params.semanticAnalysis;
    97‚Üí    const webResults = params.web_search_results || params.webResults;
    98‚Üí    
    99‚Üí    log('Data availability checked', 'debug', {
   100‚Üí      gitAnalysis: !!gitAnalysis,
   101‚Üí      vibeAnalysis: !!vibeAnalysis,
   102‚Üí      semanticAnalysis: !!semanticAnalysis,
   103‚Üí      webResults: !!webResults
   104‚Üí    });
   105‚Üí    
   106‚Üí    log('Starting comprehensive insight generation', 'info', {
   107‚Üí      receivedParams: Object.keys(params || {}),
   108‚Üí      hasGitAnalysis: !!gitAnalysis,
   109‚Üí      hasVibeAnalysis: !!vibeAnalysis,
   110‚Üí      hasSemanticAnalysis: !!semanticAnalysis,
   111‚Üí      hasWebResults: !!webResults,
   112‚Üí      gitCommitCount: gitAnalysis?.commits?.length || 0
   113‚Üí    });
   114‚Üí
   115‚Üí    try {
   116‚Üí      // Extract patterns from all analyses
   117‚Üí      const patternCatalog = await this.generatePatternCatalog(
   118‚Üí        gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, semanticAnalysis, webResults
   119‚Üí      );
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí      // Determine if we should generate separate insights for distinct patterns
   122‚Üí      const significantPatterns = patternCatalog.patterns
   123‚Üí        .filter(p => p.significance >= 7) // Only patterns with high significance
   124‚Üí        .sort((a, b) => b.significance - a.significance);
   125‚Üí      
   126‚Üí      const insightDocuments: InsightDocument[] = [];
   127‚Üí      
   128‚Üí      if (significantPatterns.length >= 1 && significantPatterns.length <= 5) {
   129‚Üí        // Generate separate insights for each significant pattern (improved logic)
   130‚Üí        log(`Generating separate insights for ${significantPatterns.length} significant patterns (‚â•7 significance)`, 'info');
   131‚Üí        
   132‚Üí        for (const pattern of significantPatterns) {
   133‚Üí          const singlePatternCatalog: PatternCatalog = {
   134‚Üí            patterns: [pattern],
   135‚Üí            summary: {
   136‚Üí              totalPatterns: 1,
   137‚Üí              byCategory: { [pattern.category]: 1 },
   138‚Üí              avgSignificance: pattern.significance,
   139‚Üí              topPatterns: [pattern.name]
   140‚Üí            }
   141‚Üí          };
   142‚Üí          
   143‚Üí          const insightDoc = await this.generateInsightDocument(
   144‚Üí            gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, semanticAnalysis, singlePatternCatalog, webResults
   145‚Üí          );
   146‚Üí          insightDocuments.push(insightDoc);
   147‚Üí        }
   148‚Üí      } else {
   149‚Üí        // Generate single comprehensive insight document
   150‚Üí        const insightDocument = await this.generateInsightDocument(
   151‚Üí          gitAnalysis, vibeAnalysis, semanticAnalysis, patternCatalog, webResults
   152‚Üí        );
   153‚Üí        insightDocuments.push(insightDocument);
   154‚Üí      }
   155‚Üí
   156‚Üí      const processingTime = Date.now() - startTime;
   157‚Üí      
   158‚Üí      // For backward compatibility, use the first document as the main one
   159‚Üí      const mainDocument = insightDocuments[0];
   160‚Üí      
   161‚Üí      const result: InsightGenerationResult = {
   162‚Üí        insightDocument: mainDocument,
   163‚Üí        insightDocuments, // Include all documents
   164‚Üí        patternCatalog,
   165‚Üí        generationMetrics: {
   166‚Üí          processingTime,
   167‚Üí          documentsGenerated: insightDocuments.length,
   168‚Üí          diagramsGenerated: insightDocuments.reduce((sum, doc) => 
   169‚Üí            sum + doc.diagrams.filter(d => d.success).length, 0),
   170‚Üí          patternsIdentified: patternCatalog.patterns.length,
   171‚Üí          qualityScore: this.calculateQualityScore(mainDocument, patternCatalog)
   172‚Üí        }
   173‚Üí      };
   174‚Üí
   175‚Üí      log('Comprehensive insight generation completed', 'info', {
   176‚Üí        processingTime,
   177‚Üí        documentsGenerated: result.generationMetrics.documentsGenerated,
   178‚Üí        diagramsGenerated: result.generationMetrics.diagramsGenerated,
   179‚Üí        patternsIdentified: result.generationMetrics.patternsIdentified,
   180‚Üí        qualityScore: result.generationMetrics.qualityScore
   181‚Üí      });
   182‚Üí
   183‚Üí      return result;
   184‚Üí
   185‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   186‚Üí      log('Insight generation failed', 'error', error);
   187‚Üí      throw error;
   188‚Üí    }
   189‚Üí  }

   198‚Üí      { hasGit: !!gitAnalysis, hasVibe: !!vibeAnalysis, hasSemantic: !!semanticAnalysis },
   199‚Üí      'Starting pattern catalog generation'
   200‚Üí    );
